text.1020: [03] aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m kusalaa dhammaa  uppajjanti, no ca tesa.m akusalaa dhammaa nirujjhissanti. itaresa.m  kusalaana.m ^a^V3.0092^ea^ uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m kusalaa ca dhammaa uppajjanti akusalaa ca  dhammaa nirujjhissanti.

text.249: [03] (kha) yattha vaa pana akusalaa dhammaa na ^a^T2.0047^ea^ uppajjanti tattha  kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjantiiti? aamantaa.

text.2502: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhundriya.m uppajjati tassa jiivitindriya.m  uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2503: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana jiivitindriya.m uppajjati tassa  cakkhundriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2504: [03] acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m jiivitindriya.m uppajjati, no  ca tesa.m cakkhundriya.m uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m ^a^T2.0186^ea^ tesa.m  jiivitindriya~nca uppajjati cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2505: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhundriya.m uppajjati tassa somanassindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2506: [03] sacakkhukaana.m vinaa somanassena upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m somanassindriya.m uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m  somanassena ^a^V3.0172^ea^ upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati  somanassindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2507: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana somanassindriya.m uppajjati tassa  cakkhundriya.m uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2508: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhundriya.m uppajjati tassa upekkhindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2509: [03] sacakkhukaana.m vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m upekkhindriya.m uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m  upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati  upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.251: [03] (kha) yattha vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa na uppajjanti tattha  kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjantiiti? natthi.
text.2510: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana upekkhindriya.m uppajjati tassa  cakkhundriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2511: [03] upekkhaaya acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m cakkhundriya.m uppajjati. upekkhaaya  sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati  cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2512: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhundriya.m uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2513: [03] sacakkhukaana.m ahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m saddhindriya.m uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m  sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati saddhindriya~nca  uppajjati ^a^T2.0187^ea^.
text.2514: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana saddhindriya.m uppajjati tassa cakkhundriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2515: [03] sahetukaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m saddhindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m cakkhundriya.m uppajjati. sahetukaana.m  sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m saddhindriya~nca uppajjati  cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2516: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhundriya.m uppajjati tassa pa~n~nindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2517: [03] sacakkhukaana.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m  ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m ^a^V3.0173^ea^ upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya~nca ^a^M3.0115^ea^ uppajjati  pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2518: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati tassa cakkhundriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2519: [03] ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m cakkhundriya.m uppajjati. ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m  sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati  cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati.
text.252: [03] 42^b^.^eb^ (ka) yattha akusalaa dhammaa na uppajjanti tattha  abyaakataa dhammaa na uppajjantiiti? uppajjanti.
text.2520: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhundriya.m uppajjati tassa manindriya.m  uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2521: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana manindriya.m uppajjati tassa cakkhundriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2522: [03] sacittakaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m manindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m cakkhundriya.m uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m manindriya~nca uppajjati cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati.  (cakkhundriyamuulaka.m)
text.2523: [03] 187^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ghaanindriya.m uppajjati tassa itthindriya.m  uppajjatiiti ^a^T2.0188^ea^?
text.2524: [03] saghaanakaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m itthindriya.m uppajjati. saghaanakaana.m itthiina.m  upapajjantiina.m taasa.m ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati itthindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2525: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana itthindriya.m uppajjati tassa ghaanindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2526: [03] itthiina.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m itthindriya.m uppajjati,  no ca taasa.m ghaanindriya.m uppajjati. itthiina.m saghaanakaana.m  upapajjantiina.m taasa.m itthindriya~nca uppajjati ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2527: [03] (ka) yassa ghaanindriya.m uppajjati tassa purisindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2528: [03] saghaanakaana.m na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m purisindriya.m uppajjati. saghaanakaana.m  purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati purisindriya~nca  uppajjati.
text.2529: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana purisindriya.m uppajjati tassa ghaanindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.253: [03] (kha) yattha vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa na uppajjanti tattha  akusalaa dhammaa na uppajjantiiti? natthi.
text.2530: [03] purisaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m uppajjati,  no ^a^V3.0174^ea^ ca tesa.m ghaanindriya.m uppajjati. purisaana.m saghaanakaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya~nca uppajjati ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2531: [03] (ka) yassa ghaanindriya.m uppajjati tassa jiivitindriya.m  uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2532: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana jiivitindriya.m uppajjati tassa  ghaanindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2533: [03] aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m jiivitindriya.m uppajjati, no ^a^T2.0189^ea^ ca  tesa.m ghaanindriya.m uppajjati. saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  jiivitindriya~nca uppajjati ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2534: [03] (ka) yassa ghaanindriya.m uppajjati tassa somanassindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2535: [03] saghaanakaana.m vinaa somanassena upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m ^a^M3.0116^ea^ somanassindriya.m uppajjati. saghaanakaana.m  somanassena upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati  somanassindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2536: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana somanassindriya.m uppajjati tassa  ghaanindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2537: [03] somanassena aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m somanassindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m ghaanindriya.m uppajjati. somanassena  saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m somanassindriya~nca uppajjati  ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2538: [03] (ka) yassa ghaanindriya.m uppajjati tassa upekkhindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2539: [03] saghaanakaana.m vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m upekkhindriya.m uppajjati. saghaanakaana.m  upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca  uppajjati.
text.2540: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana upekkhindriya.m uppajjati tassa ghaanindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2541: [03] upekkhaaya aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya.m  uppajjati ^a^V3.0175^ea^, no ca tesa.m ghaanindriya.m uppajjati. upekkhaaya saghaanakaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2542: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^T2.0190^ea^ ghaanindriya.m uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2543: [03] saghaanakaana.m ahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya.m uppajjati,  no ca tesa.m saddhindriya.m uppajjati. saghaanakaana.m sahetukaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati saddhindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2544: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana saddhindriya.m uppajjati tassa ghaanindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2545: [03] sahetukaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m saddhindriya.m uppajjati,  no ca tesa.m ghaanindriya.m uppajjati. sahetukaana.m saghaanakaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m saddhindriya~nca uppajjati ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2546: [03] (ka) yassa ghaanindriya.m uppajjati tassa pa~n~nindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2547: [03] saghaanakaana.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati. saghaanakaana.m  ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati  pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2548: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati tassa ghaanindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2549: [03] ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m ghaanindriya.m uppajjati. ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m  saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati ghaanindriya~nca  uppajjati.
text.255: [03] 43^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjanti tassa  tattha akusalaa dhammaa na uppajjantiiti?
text.2550: [03] (ka) yassa ghaanindriya.m uppajjati tassa manindriya.m  uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2551: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana manindriya.m uppajjati tassa ghaanindriya.m  uppajjatiiti ^a^T2.0191^ea^?
text.2552: [03] sacittakaana.m aghaanakaana.m ^a^M3.0117^ea^ upapajjantaana.m tesa.m manindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m ghaanindriya.m uppajjati. saghaanakaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m manindriya~nca uppajjati ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati.  (ghaanindriyamuulaka.m)
text.2553: [03] 188^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V3.0176^ea^ itthindriya.m uppajjati tassa purisindriya.m  uppajjatiiti? no.
text.2554: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana purisindriya.m uppajjati tassa itthindriya.m  uppajjatiiti? no.
text.2555: [03] (ka) yassa itthindriya.m uppajjati tassa jiivitindriya.m  uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2556: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana jiivitindriya.m uppajjati tassa itthindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2557: [03] na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m jiivitindriya.m uppajjati, no ca  tesa.m itthindriya.m uppajjati. itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m  jiivitindriya~nca uppajjati itthindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2558: [03] (ka) yassa itthindriya.m uppajjati tassa somanassindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2559: [03] itthiina.m vinaa somanassena upapajjantiina.m taasa.m itthindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca taasa.m somanassindriya.m uppajjati. itthiina.m  somanassena upapajjantiina.m taasa.m itthindriya~nca uppajjati  somanassindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.256: [03] akusalaana.m uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha kusalaa dhammaa na  uppajjanti, no ca tesa.m tattha akusalaa dhammaa na uppajjanti.  sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne kusalavippayuttaakusalavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha kusalaa ca dhammaa na uppajjanti  akusalaa ca dhammaa na uppajjanti.
text.2560: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana somanassindriya.m uppajjati tassa  itthindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2561: [03] somanassena na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m somanassindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m itthindriya.m uppajjati. somanassena itthiina.m  upapajjantiina.m taasa.m somanassindriya~nca uppajjati itthindriya~nca  uppajjati.
text.2562: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^T2.0192^ea^ itthindriya.m uppajjati tassa upekkhindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2563: [03] itthiina.m vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantiina.m taasa.m itthindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca taasa.m upekkhindriya.m uppajjati. itthiina.m upekkhaaya  upapajjantiina.m taasa.m itthindriya~nca uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2564: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana upekkhindriya.m uppajjati tassa itthindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2565: [03] upekkhaaya na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m itthindriya.m uppajjati. upekkhaaya itthiina.m  upapajjantiina.m taasa.m upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati itthindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2566: [03] (ka) yassa itthindriya.m uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2567: [03] itthiina.m ahetukaana.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m itthindriya.m uppajjati,  no ^a^V3.0177^ea^ ca taasa.m saddhindriya.m uppajjati. itthiina.m sahetukaana.m upapajjantiina.m  taasa.m itthindriya~nca uppajjati saddhindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2568: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana saddhindriya.m uppajjati tassa itthindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2569: [03] sahetukaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m saddhindriya.m uppajjati,  no ^a^M3.0118^ea^ ca tesa.m itthindriya.m uppajjati. sahetukaana.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m  taasa.m saddhindriya~nca uppajjati itthindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.257: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha akusalaa dhammaa na uppajjanti  tassa tattha kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjantiiti?
text.2570: [03] (ka) yassa itthindriya.m uppajjati tassa pa~n~nindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2571: [03] itthiina.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m itthindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca taasa.m pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati. itthiina.m  ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m ^a^T2.0193^ea^ upapajjantiina.m taasa.m itthindriya~nca uppajjati  pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2572: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati tassa itthindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2573: [03] ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m itthindriya.m uppajjati. ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m  itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati itthindriya~nca  uppajjati.
text.2574: [03] (ka) yassa itthindriya.m uppajjati tassa manindriya.m  uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2575: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana manindriya.m uppajjati tassa itthindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2576: [03] sacittakaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m manindriya.m uppajjati,  no ca tesa.m itthindriya.m uppajjati. itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m  manindriya~nca uppajjati itthindriya~nca uppajjati.  (itthindriyamuulaka.m)
text.2577: [03] 189^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa purisindriya.m uppajjati tassa  jiivitindriya.m uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2578: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana jiivitindriya.m uppajjati tassa  purisindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2579: [03] na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m jiivitindriya.m uppajjati, no ca  tesa.m purisindriya.m uppajjati. purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  jiivitindriya~nca uppajjati purisindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.258: [03] kusalaana.m uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha akusalaa dhammaa na  uppajjanti, no ^a^V3.0018^ea^ ca tesa.m tattha kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjanti. sabbesa.m  cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne akusalavippayuttakusalavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne ^a^M3.0012^ea^ asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha akusalaa ca dhammaa na  uppajjanti kusalaa ca dhammaa na uppajjanti.
text.2580: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^V3.0178^ea^ purisindriya.m uppajjati tassa somanassindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2581: [03] purisaana.m vinaa somanassena upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m somanassindriya.m uppajjati. purisaana.m  somanassena upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya~nca uppajjati  somanassindriya~nca ^a^T2.0194^ea^ uppajjati.
text.2582: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana somanassindriya.m uppajjati tassa  purisindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2583: [03] somanassena na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m somanassindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m purisindriya.m uppajjati. somanassena  purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m somanassindriya~nca uppajjati  purisindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2584: [03] (ka) yassa purisindriya.m uppajjati tassa upekkhindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2585: [03] purisaana.m vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m upekkhindriya.m uppajjati. purisaana.m upekkhaaya  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya~nca uppajjati ^a^M3.0119^ea^ upekkhindriya~nca  uppajjati.
text.2586: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana upekkhindriya.m uppajjati tassa  purisindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2587: [03] upekkhaaya na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m purisindriya.m uppajjati. upekkhaaya purisaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati purisindriya~nca  uppajjati.
text.2588: [03] (ka) yassa purisindriya.m uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2589: [03] purisaana.m ahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m uppajjati,  no ca tesa.m saddhindriya.m uppajjati. purisaana.m sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m purisindriya~nca uppajjati saddhindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.259: [03] (ka) yassa yattha kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjanti tassa tattha  abyaakataa ^a^T2.0048^ea^ dhammaa na uppajjantiiti?
text.2590: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana saddhindriya.m uppajjati tassa purisindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2591: [03] sahetukaana.m na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m saddhindriya.m  uppajjati ^a^T2.0195^ea^, no ^a^V3.0179^ea^ ca tesa.m purisindriya.m uppajjati. sahetukaana.m purisaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m saddhindriya~nca uppajjati purisindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2592: [03] (ka) yassa purisindriya.m uppajjati tassa pa~n~nindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2593: [03] purisaana.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati. purisaana.m  ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya~nca uppajjati  pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2594: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati tassa purisindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2595: [03] ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m purisindriya.m uppajjati. ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m  purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati purisindriya~nca  uppajjati.
text.2596: [03] (ka) yassa purisindriya.m uppajjati tassa manindriya.m  uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2597: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana manindriya.m uppajjati tassa purisindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2598: [03] sacittakaana.m na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m manindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m purisindriya.m uppajjati. purisaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m manindriya~nca uppajjati purisindriya~nca uppajjati.  (purisindriyamuulaka.m)
text.2599: [03] 190^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa jiivitindriya.m uppajjati tassa  somanassindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.260: [03] sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte kusalavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne  tesa.m tattha kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjanti, no ca tesa.m tattha abyaakataa  dhammaa na uppajjanti. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  aruupe akusalaana.m uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha kusalaa ca dhammaa na  uppajjanti abyaakataa ca dhammaa na uppajjanti.
text.2600: [03] vinaa somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte  somanassavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m jiivitindriya.m uppajjati,  no ca tesa.m ^a^T2.0196^ea^ somanassindriya.m uppajjati. somanassena upapajjantaana.m  pavatte somanassasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m jiivitindriya~nca  uppajjati somanassindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2601: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^M3.0120^ea^ vaa pana somanassindriya.m uppajjati tassa  jiivitindriya.m uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2602: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^V3.0180^ea^ jiivitindriya.m uppajjati tassa upekkhindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2603: [03] vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m pavatte upekkhaavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m jiivitindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m upekkhindriya.m  uppajjati. upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m pavatte upekkhaasampayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m jiivitindriya~nca uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca  uppajjati.
text.2604: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana upekkhindriya.m uppajjati tassa  jiivitindriya.m uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2605: [03] (ka) yassa jiivitindriya.m uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2606: [03] ahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte saddhaavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m jiivitindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m saddhindriya.m  uppajjati. sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte saddhaasampayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m jiivitindriya~nca uppajjati saddhindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2607: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana saddhindriya.m uppajjati tassa jiivitindriya.m  uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2608: [03] (ka) yassa jiivitindriya.m uppajjati tassa pa~n~nindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2609: [03] ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte ~naa.navippayuttacittassa ^a^T2.0197^ea^  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m jiivitindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m  uppajjati. ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte ~naa.nasampayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m jiivitindriya~nca uppajjati pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.261: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha abyaakataa dhammaa na uppajjanti  tassa tattha kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjantiiti?
text.2610: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati tassa  jiivitindriya.m uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2611: [03] (ka) yassa jiivitindriya.m uppajjati tassa manindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2612: [03] acittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m jiivitindriya.m uppajjati, no ca  tesa.m manindriya.m uppajjati. sacittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m jiivitindriya~nca uppajjati manindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2613: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana manindriya.m uppajjati tassa jiivitindriya.m  uppajjatiiti? aamantaa. (jiivitindriyamuulaka.m)
text.2614: [03] 191^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V3.0181^ea^ somanassindriya.m uppajjati tassa  upekkhindriya.m uppajjatiiti? no.
text.2615: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana upekkhindriya.m uppajjati tassa  somanassindriya.m uppajjatiiti? no.
text.2616: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^M3.0121^ea^ somanassindriya.m uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2617: [03] pavatte somanassasampayuttasaddhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne  tesa.m somanassindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m saddhindriya.m uppajjati.  somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte  somanassasampayuttasaddhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  somanassindriya~nca uppajjati saddhindriya~nca uppajjati ^a^T2.0198^ea^.
text.2618: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana saddhindriya.m uppajjati tassa  somanassindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2619: [03] sahetukaana.m vinaa somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte  saddhaasampayuttasomanassavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m saddhindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m somanassindriya.m uppajjati. somanassena  upapajjantaana.m pavatte saddhaasampayuttasomanassasampayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m saddhindriya~nca uppajjati somanassindriya~nca  uppajjati.
text.262: [03] aruupe kusalaana.m uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha abyaakataa dhammaa na  uppajjanti, no ca tesa.m tattha kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjanti. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne aruupe akusalaana.m uppaadakkha.ne  tesa.m tattha abyaakataa ca dhammaa na uppajjanti kusalaa ca dhammaa na  uppajjanti.
text.2620: [03] (ka) yassa somanassindriya.m uppajjati tassa pa~n~nindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2621: [03] somanassena ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  somanassasampayutta~naa.navippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  somanassindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati.  somanassena ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  somanassasampayutta~naa.nasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  somanassindriya~nca uppajjati pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2622: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati tassa  somanassindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2623: [03] ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m vinaa somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte  ~naa.nasampayuttasomanassavippayuttacittassa ^a^V3.0182^ea^ uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m somanassindriya.m uppajjati. ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m  somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte  ~naa.nasampayuttasomanassasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati somanassindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2624: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^T2.0199^ea^ somanassindriya.m uppajjati tassa manindriya.m  uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2625: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana manindriya.m uppajjati tassa  somanassindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2626: [03] sacittakaana.m vinaa somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte  somanassavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m manindriya.m uppajjati,  no ca tesa.m somanassindriya.m uppajjati. somanassena upapajjantaana.m  pavatte somanassasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m manindriya~nca  uppajjati somanassindriya~nca uppajjati. (somanassindriyamuulaka.m)
text.2627: [03] 192^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^M3.0122^ea^ upekkhindriya.m uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2628: [03] upekkhaaya ahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  upekkhaasampayuttasaddhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m upekkhindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m saddhindriya.m uppajjati. upekkhaaya sahetukaana.m  upapajjantaana.m pavatte upekkhaasampayuttasaddhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne  tesa.m upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati saddhindriya~nca uppajjati.

text.263: [03] 44^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha akusalaa dhammaa na uppajjanti tassa  tattha abyaakataa dhammaa na uppajjantiiti?

text.2633: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati tassa  upekkhindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2634: [03] ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m pavatte  ~naa.nasampayuttaupekkhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m upekkhindriya.m uppajjati. ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m  upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m pavatte ~naa.nasampayuttaupekkhaasampayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati.

text.2772: [03] (kha) yassa vaa ^a^M3.0131^ea^ pana yattha pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  ghaanindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2773: [03] ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m uppajjati. ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m  saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati  ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2774: [03] (ka) yassa yattha ghaanindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha manindriya.m  uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2775: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V3.0196^ea^ vaa pana yattha manindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  ghaanindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2776: [03] sacittakaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha manindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m uppajjati. saghaanakaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha manindriya~nca ^a^T2.0215^ea^ uppajjati ghaanindriya~nca  uppajjati. (ghaanindriyamuulaka.m)
text.2777: [03] 206^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha itthindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  purisindriya.m uppajjatiiti? no.
text.2778: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha purisindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  itthindriya.m uppajjatiiti? no.
text.2779: [03] (ka) yassa yattha itthindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  jiivitindriya.m uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.278: [03] (ka) yattha kusalaa dhammaa uppajjittha tattha abyaakataa dhammaa  uppajjitthaati? aamantaa.
text.2780: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha jiivitindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  itthindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2781: [03] na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m uppajjati,  no ca tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m uppajjati. itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m  tattha jiivitindriya~nca uppajjati itthindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2782: [03] (ka) yassa yattha itthindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  somanassindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2783: [03] itthiina.m vinaa somanassena upapajjantiina.m taasa.m tattha itthindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca taasa.m tattha somanassindriya.m uppajjati. itthiina.m  somanassena upapajjantiina.m taasa.m tattha itthindriya~nca uppajjati  somanassindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2784: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha somanassindriya.m uppajjati tassa  tattha itthindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2785: [03] somanassena na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  somanassindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m uppajjati.  somanassena itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m tattha somanassindriya~nca  uppajjati itthindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2786: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^T2.0216^ea^ ^a^V3.0197^ea^ yattha itthindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  upekkhindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2787: [03] itthiina.m vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantiina.m taasa.m tattha itthindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca taasa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m uppajjati. itthiina.m  upekkhaaya upapajjantiina.m taasa.m ^a^M3.0132^ea^ tattha itthindriya~nca uppajjati  upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2788: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha upekkhindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  itthindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2789: [03] upekkhaaya na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m uppajjati. upekkhaaya  itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m tattha upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati  itthindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.279: [03] (kha) yattha vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa uppajjittha tattha kusalaa  dhammaa uppajjitthaati?
text.2790: [03] (ka) yassa yattha itthindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha saddhindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.2791: [03] itthiina.m ahetukaana.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m tattha itthindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca taasa.m tattha saddhindriya.m uppajjati. itthiina.m  sahetukaana.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m tattha itthindriya~nca uppajjati  saddhindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2792: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha saddhindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  itthindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2793: [03] sahetukaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m uppajjati. sahetukaana.m  itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m tattha saddhindriya~nca uppajjati  itthindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2794: [03] (ka) yassa yattha itthindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m ^a^T2.0217^ea^ uppajjatiiti?
text.2795: [03] itthiina.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m tattha itthindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca taasa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati. itthiina.m  ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m ^a^V3.0198^ea^ uppajjantiina.m taasa.m tattha itthindriya~nca uppajjati  pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2796: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  itthindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2797: [03] ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m uppajjati. ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m  itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati  itthindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2798: [03] (ka) yassa yattha itthindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha manindriya.m  uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2799: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  itthindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.280: [03] asa~n~nasatte ^a^T2.0050^ea^ tattha abyaakataa dhammaa uppajjittha, no ca tattha  kusalaa dhammaa uppajjittha. catuvokaare pa~ncavokaare tattha abyaakataa  ca dhammaa uppajjittha kusalaa ca dhammaa uppajjittha.
text.2800: [03] sacittakaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha manindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m uppajjati. itthiina.m  upapajjantiina.m taasa.m tattha manindriya~nca uppajjati itthindriya~nca  uppajjati. (itthindriyamuulaka.m)
text.2801: [03] 207^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha purisindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  jiivitindriya.m uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2802: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha jiivitindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  purisindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2803: [03] na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m uppajjati  ^a^M3.0133^ea^, no ca tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m uppajjati. purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya~nca ^a^T2.0218^ea^ uppajjati purisindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2804: [03] (ka) yassa yattha purisindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  somanassindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2805: [03] purisaana.m vinaa somanassena upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  purisindriya.m uppajjati ^a^V3.0199^ea^, no ca tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m uppajjati.  purisaana.m somanassena upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha purisindriya~nca  uppajjati somanassindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2806: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha somanassindriya.m uppajjati tassa  tattha purisindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2807: [03] somanassena na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  somanassindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m uppajjati.  somanassena purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha somanassindriya~nca  uppajjati purisindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2808: [03] (ka) yassa yattha purisindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  upekkhindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2809: [03] purisaana.m vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m uppajjati. purisaana.m  upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha purisindriya~nca uppajjati  upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.281: [03] 48^b^.^eb^ (ka) yattha akusalaa dhammaa uppajjittha tattha abyaakataa  dhammaa uppajjitthaati? aamantaa.
text.2810: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha upekkhindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  purisindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2811: [03] upekkhaaya na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m uppajjati. upekkhaaya  purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati  purisindriya~nca ^a^T2.0219^ea^ uppajjati.
text.2812: [03] (ka) yassa yattha purisindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2813: [03] purisaana.m ahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m uppajjati. purisaana.m  sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha purisindriya~nca uppajjati  saddhindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2814: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha saddhindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  purisindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2815: [03] sahetukaana.m na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m uppajjati. sahetukaana.m  purisaana.m ^a^V3.0200^ea^ upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha saddhindriya~nca uppajjati  purisindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2816: [03] (ka) yassa yattha purisindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2817: [03] purisaana.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati. purisaana.m  ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ^a^M3.0134^ea^ tattha purisindriya~nca uppajjati  pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2818: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  purisindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2819: [03] ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m uppajjati.  ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya~nca  uppajjati purisindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.282: [03] (kha) yattha vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa uppajjittha tattha  akusalaa dhammaa uppajjitthaati?
text.2820: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^T2.0220^ea^ yattha purisindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  manindriya.m uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2821: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  purisindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2822: [03] sacittakaana.m na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha manindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m uppajjati. purisaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha manindriya~nca uppajjati purisindriya~nca  uppajjati. (purisindriyamuulaka.m)
text.2823: [03] 208^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha jiivitindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  somanassindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2824: [03] vinaa somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte  somanassavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m ^a^V3.0201^ea^ uppajjati.  somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte somanassasampayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya~nca uppajjati  somanassindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2825: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha somanassindriya.m uppajjati tassa  tattha jiivitindriya.m uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2826: [03] (ka) yassa yattha jiivitindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  upekkhindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2827: [03] vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m pavatte upekkhaavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  upekkhindriya.m uppajjati. upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m pavatte  upekkhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya~nca  uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2828: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^T2.0221^ea^ vaa pana yattha upekkhindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  jiivitindriya.m uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2829: [03] (ka) yassa yattha jiivitindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.283: [03] asa~n~nasatte tattha abyaakataa dhammaa uppajjittha, no ca tattha  akusalaa dhammaa uppajjittha. catuvokaare pa~ncavokaare tattha abyaakataa  ca dhammaa uppajjittha akusalaa ca dhammaa uppajjittha.
text.2830: [03] ahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte saddhaavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  saddhindriya.m uppajjati. sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  saddhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m ^a^M3.0135^ea^ tattha jiivitindriya~nca  uppajjati saddhindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2831: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha saddhindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  jiivitindriya.m uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2832: [03] (ka) yassa yattha jiivitindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2833: [03] ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte ~naa.navippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m ^a^V3.0202^ea^ uppajjati. ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  ~naa.nasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya~nca  uppajjati pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2834: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  jiivitindriya.m uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2835: [03] (ka) yassa yattha jiivitindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  manindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2836: [03] acittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m uppajjati ^a^T2.0222^ea^,  no ca tesa.m tattha manindriya.m uppajjati. sacittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m  pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya~nca uppajjati  manindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2837: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  jiivitindriya.m uppajjatiiti? aamantaa. (jiivitindriyamuulaka.m)
text.2838: [03] 209^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha somanassindriya.m uppajjati tassa  tattha upekkhindriya.m uppajjatiiti? no.
text.2839: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha upekkhindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  somanassindriya.m uppajjatiiti? no.
text.2840: [03] (ka) yassa yattha somanassindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2841: [03] pavatte somanassasampayuttasaddhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne  tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m  uppajjati. somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte  somanassasampayuttasaddhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  somanassindriya~nca uppajjati saddhindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2842: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha saddhindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  somanassindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2843: [03] sahetukaana.m vinaa somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte  saddhaasampayuttasomanassavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  saddhindriya.m uppajjati ^a^V3.0203^ea^, no ca tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m uppajjati.  somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte  saddhaasampayuttasomanassasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  saddhindriya~nca uppajjati somanassindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2844: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^T2.0223^ea^ ^a^M3.0136^ea^ yattha somanassindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2845: [03] somanassena ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  somanassasampayutta~naa.navippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  somanassindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati.  somanassena ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  somanassasampayutta~naa.nasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  somanassindriya~nca uppajjati pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2846: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  somanassindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2847: [03] ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m vinaa somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte  ~naa.nasampayuttasomanassavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m uppajjati.  ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte  ~naa.nasampayuttasomanassasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati somanassindriya~nca uppajjati.

(somanassindriyamuulaka.m)
text.2851: [03] 210^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V3.0204^ea^ yattha upekkhindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2852: [03] upekkhaaya ahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  upekkhaasampayuttasaddhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  upekkhindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m uppajjati.  upekkhaaya sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  upekkhaasampayuttasaddhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati saddhindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2853: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha saddhindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  upekkhindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2854: [03] sahetukaana.m vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m pavatte  saddhaasampayuttaupekkhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  saddhindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m uppajjati.  sahetukaana.m upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m pavatte  saddhaasampayuttaupekkhaasampayuttacittassa ^a^M3.0137^ea^ uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  saddhindriya~nca uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2855: [03] (ka) yassa yattha upekkhindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2856: [03] upekkhaaya ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  upekkhaasampayutta~naa.navippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne ^a^T2.0225^ea^ tesa.m tattha  upekkhindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati.  upekkhaaya ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  upekkhaasampayutta~naa.nasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2857: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  upekkhindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2858: [03] ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m pavatte  ~naa.nasampayuttaupekkhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m uppajjati.  ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m pavatte  ~naa.nasampayuttaupekkhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne ^a^V3.0205^ea^ tesa.m tattha  pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.2859: [03] (ka) yassa yattha upekkhindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  manindriya.m uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.286: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha akusalaa dhammaa uppajjittha tassa  tattha kusalaa dhammaa uppajjitthaati?
text.2860: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  upekkhindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2861: [03] sacittakaana.m vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m pavatte  upekkhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha manindriya.m uppajjati,  no ca tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m uppajjati. upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m  pavatte upekkhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha manindriya~nca  uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati. (upekkhindriyamuulaka.m)
text.2862: [03] 211^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^T2.0226^ea^ yattha saddhindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.2863: [03] sahetukaana.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  saddhaasampayutta~naa.navippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati. sahetukaana.m  ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte saddhaasampayutta~naa.nasampayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha saddhindriya~nca uppajjati pa~n~nindriya~nca  uppajjati.
text.2864: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2865: [03] (ka) yassa yattha saddhindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha manindriya.m  uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2866: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m uppajjatiiti ^a^M3.0138^ea^?
text.2867: [03] sacittakaana.m ahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  saddhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha manindriya.m uppajjati,  no ca tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m uppajjati. sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m  pavatte saddhaasampayuttacittassa ^a^V3.0206^ea^ uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha manindriya~nca  uppajjati saddhindriya~nca uppajjati. (saddhindriyamuulaka.m)
text.2868: [03] 212^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  manindriya.m uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2869: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.287: [03] suddhaavaasaana.m dutiye akusale citte vattamaane tesa.m tattha  akusalaa dhammaa uppajjittha, no ca tesa.m tattha kusalaa dhammaa  uppajjittha. itaresa.m catuvokaaraana.m pa~ncavokaaraana.m tesa.m tattha akusalaa  ca dhammaa uppajjittha kusalaa ca dhammaa uppajjittha.
text.2870: [03] sacittakaana.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  ~naa.navippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha ^a^T2.0227^ea^ manindriya.m uppajjati,  no ca tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati. ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m  upapajjantaana.m pavatte ~naa.nasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  manindriya~nca uppajjati pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati.  (pa~n~nindriyamuulaka.m)
text.2872: [03] 213^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa  sotindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2873: [03] acakkhukaana.m sasotakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m sotindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  acakkhukaana.m asotakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya~nca na  uppajjati sotindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2874: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana sotindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2875: [03] asotakaana.m sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m sotindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  asotakaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m sotindriya~nca na  uppajjati cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2876: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa ghaanindriya.m na  uppajjatiiti?
text.2877: [03] acakkhukaana.m saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m ghaanindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  acakkhukaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya~nca na  uppajjati ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2878: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V3.0207^ea^ vaa pana ghaanindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2879: [03] aghaanakaana.m sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m ^a^T2.0228^ea^ tesa.m ghaanindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca ^a^M3.0139^ea^ tesa.m cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  aghaanakaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya~nca na  uppajjati cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.288: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^V3.0021^ea^ ^a^M3.0014^ea^ yattha kusalaa dhammaa uppajjittha tassa tattha  abyaakataa dhammaa uppajjitthaati? aamantaa.

text.2881: [03] acakkhukaana.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m cakkhundriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca taasa.m itthindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  acakkhukaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya~nca na  uppajjati itthindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2882: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana itthindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2883: [03] na itthiina.m sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  na itthiina.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya~nca na uppajjati  cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati.

text.2887: [03] na purisaana.m sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m cakkhundriya.m ^a^T2.0229^ea^ na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  na ^a^V3.0208^ea^ purisaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya~nca na  uppajjati cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2888: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa jiivitindriya.m na  uppajjatiiti?
text.2889: [03] acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati, no  ca tesa.m jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m  cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjati.

text.2895: [03] acakkhukaana.m upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  cakkhundriya~nca ^a^T2.0230^ea^ na uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati.

text.2929: [03] aghaanakaana.m sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m saddhindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  aghaanakaana.m ^a^T2.0234^ea^ ^a^V3.0212^ea^ ahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjati  saddhindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.293: [03] suddhaavaasaana.m dutiye citte vattamaane asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha  abyaakataa dhammaa uppajjittha, no ca tesa.m tattha akusalaa dhammaa  uppajjittha. itaresa.m catuvokaaraana.m pa~ncavokaaraana.m tesa.m tattha  abyaakataa ca dhammaa uppajjittha akusalaa ca dhammaa uppajjittha.
text.2930: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana saddhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  ghaanindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2931: [03] ahetukaana.m saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m saddhindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m ghaanindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  ahetukaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m saddhindriya~nca na uppajjati  ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2932: [03] (ka) yassa ghaanindriya.m na uppajjati tassa pa~n~nindriya.m na  uppajjatiiti?
text.2933: [03] aghaanakaana.m ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  aghaanakaana.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya~nca na  uppajjati pa~n~nindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2934: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  ghaanindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2935: [03] ~naa.navippayuttaana.m saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m ghaanindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  ~naa.navippayuttaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m pa~n~nindriya~nca na  uppajjati ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2936: [03] (ka) yassa ghaanindriya.m na uppajjati tassa manindriya.m na  uppajjatiiti?
text.2937: [03] aghaanakaana.m sacittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m manindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  acittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjati  manindriya~nca ^a^T2.0235^ea^ na uppajjati.
text.2938: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana manindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  ghaanindriya.m na uppajjatiiti? aamantaa. (ghaanindriyamuulaka.m)
text.2939: [03] 215^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V3.0213^ea^ ^a^M3.0143^ea^ itthindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  purisindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2940: [03] purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca  tesa.m purisindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na itthiina.m na  purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya~nca na uppajjati  purisindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2941: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana purisindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  itthindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2942: [03] itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m purisindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca  taasa.m itthindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na purisaana.m na  itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya~nca na uppajjati itthindriya~nca  na uppajjati.
text.2943: [03] (ka) yassa itthindriya.m na uppajjati tassa jiivitindriya.m na  uppajjatiiti?
text.2944: [03] na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca  tesa.m jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m  itthindriya~nca na uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2945: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  itthindriya.m na uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2946: [03] (ka) yassa itthindriya.m na uppajjati tassa somanassindriya.m  na uppajjatiiti?
text.2947: [03] na itthiina.m somanassena upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m somanassindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m na itthiina.m vinaa somanassena upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  itthindriya~nca ^a^T2.0236^ea^ na uppajjati somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2948: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana somanassindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  itthindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2949: [03] vinaa somanassena itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m somanassindriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca taasa.m itthindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m vinaa ^a^V3.0214^ea^ somanassena na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati itthindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.295: [03] 51^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjittha tassa akusalaa  dhammaa na uppajjitthaati? natthi.
text.2950: [03] (ka) yassa itthindriya.m na uppajjati tassa upekkhindriya.m na  uppajjatiiti?
text.2951: [03] na itthiina.m upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m na itthiina.m vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  itthindriya~nca na uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2952: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  itthindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2953: [03] vinaa upekkhaaya itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m upekkhindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca taasa.m itthindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  vinaa upekkhaaya na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya~nca na  uppajjati itthindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2954: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^M3.0144^ea^ itthindriya.m na uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m na  uppajjatiiti?
text.2955: [03] na itthiina.m sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m saddhindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  na itthiina.m ahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya~nca na uppajjati  saddhindriya~nca ^a^T2.0237^ea^ na uppajjati.
text.2956: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana saddhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  itthindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2957: [03] ahetukaana.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m saddhindriya.m na uppajjati,  no ca taasa.m itthindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m ahetukaana.m  na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m saddhindriya~nca na uppajjati  itthindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2958: [03] (ka) yassa itthindriya.m na uppajjati tassa pa~n~nindriya.m na  uppajjatiiti?
text.2959: [03] na itthiina.m ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  na ^a^V3.0215^ea^ itthiina.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya~nca na  uppajjati pa~n~nindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.296: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana akusalaa dhammaa na uppajjittha tassa  kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjitthaati? natthi.
text.2960: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  itthindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2961: [03] ~naa.navippayuttaana.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m pa~n~nindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca taasa.m itthindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  ~naa.navippayuttaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m pa~n~nindriya~nca na  uppajjati itthindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2962: [03] (ka) yassa itthindriya.m na uppajjati tassa manindriya.m na  uppajjatiiti?
text.2963: [03] na itthiina.m sacittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m manindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  acittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya~nca na uppajjati  manindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2964: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana manindriya.m na uppajjati tassa ^a^T2.0238^ea^ itthindriya.m  na uppajjatiiti? aamantaa. (itthindriyamuulaka.m)
text.2965: [03] 216^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa purisindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2966: [03] na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m na uppajjati, no  ca tesa.m jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m  purisindriya~nca na uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2967: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  purisindriya.m na uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2968: [03] (ka) yassa purisindriya.m na uppajjati tassa somanassindriya.m  na uppajjatiiti?
text.2969: [03] na purisaana.m somanassena upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m somanassindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m na ^a^V3.0216^ea^ purisaana.m vinaa ^a^M3.0145^ea^ somanassena upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  purisindriya~nca na uppajjati somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.297: [03] (ka) yassa kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjittha tassa abyaakataa  dhammaa na uppajjitthaati? natthi.
text.2970: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana somanassindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  purisindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2971: [03] vinaa somanassena purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m somanassindriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m purisindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m vinaa somanassena na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati purisindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2972: [03] (ka) yassa purisindriya.m na uppajjati tassa upekkhindriya.m na  uppajjatiiti?
text.2973: [03] na purisaana.m upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m na purisaana.m vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  purisindriya~nca ^a^T2.0239^ea^ na uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2974: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  purisindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2975: [03] vinaa upekkhaaya purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m purisindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  vinaa upekkhaaya na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya~nca na  uppajjati purisindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2976: [03] (ka) yassa purisindriya.m na uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m na  uppajjatiiti?
text.2977: [03] na purisaana.m sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m saddhindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  na purisaana.m ahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya~nca na  uppajjati saddhindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2978: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana saddhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  purisindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2979: [03] ahetukaana.m purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m saddhindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ^a^V3.0217^ea^ ca tesa.m purisindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  ahetukaana.m na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m saddhindriya~nca na uppajjati  purisindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.298: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa na uppajjittha tassa  kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjitthaati? natthi.
text.2980: [03] (ka) yassa purisindriya.m na uppajjati tassa pa~n~nindriya.m na  uppajjatiiti?
text.2981: [03] na purisaana.m ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  na purisaana.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya~nca ^a^T2.0240^ea^ na  uppajjati pa~n~nindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2982: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  purisindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2983: [03] ~naa.navippayuttaana.m purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m purisindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  ~naa.navippayuttaana.m ^a^M3.0146^ea^ na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m pa~n~nindriya~nca na  uppajjati purisindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2984: [03] (ka) yassa purisindriya.m na uppajjati tassa manindriya.m na  uppajjatiiti?
text.2985: [03] na purisaana.m sacittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m manindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  acittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya~nca na uppajjati  manindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2986: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana manindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  purisindriya.m na uppajjatiiti? aamantaa. (purisindriyamuulaka.m)
text.2987: [03] 217^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  somanassindriya.m na uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2988: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana somanassindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2989: [03] vinaa somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte  somanassavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne ^a^V3.0218^ea^ tesa.m somanassindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m somanassindriya~nca na  uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.299: [03] 52^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V3.0022^ea^ akusalaa dhammaa na uppajjittha tassa  abyaakataa dhammaa na uppajjitthaati? natthi.
text.2990: [03] (ka) yassa jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati tassa upekkhindriya.m  na ^a^T2.0241^ea^ uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2991: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2992: [03] vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m pavatte upekkhaavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca na  uppajjati.
text.2993: [03] (ka) yassa jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m na  uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2994: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana saddhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2995: [03] ahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte saddhaavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m saddhindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m jiivitindriya.m  na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  saddhindriya~nca na uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.2996: [03] (ka) yassa jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati tassa pa~n~nindriya.m na  uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.2997: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.2998: [03] ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte ~naa.navippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m ^a^M3.0147^ea^ cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m pa~n~nindriya~nca na uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca na  uppajjati.
text.2999: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^T2.0242^ea^ ^a^V3.0219^ea^ jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati tassa manindriya.m na  uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.300: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa na uppajjittha tassa  akusalaa dhammaa na uppajjitthaati? natthi.
text.3000: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana manindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3001: [03] acittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m manindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca  tesa.m jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m manindriya~nca na uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca na  uppajjati. (jiivitindriyamuulaka.m)
text.3002: [03] 218^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa somanassindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  upekkhindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3003: [03] upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m pavatte upekkhaasampayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m somanassindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m  upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  somanassavippayuttaupekkhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne  nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati  upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3004: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  somanassindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3005: [03] somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte somanassasampayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m  somanassindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  upekkhaavippayuttasomanassavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne  nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati  somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3006: [03] (ka) yassa somanassindriya.m na uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m  na ^a^T2.0243^ea^ uppajjatiiti?
text.3007: [03] vinaa somanassena sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  somanassavippayuttasaddhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  somanassindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m saddhindriya.m na uppajjati.  sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  somanassavippayuttasaddhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne  nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati  saddhindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3008: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V3.0220^ea^ vaa pana saddhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  somanassindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3009: [03] pavatte saddhaavippayuttasomanassasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne  tesa.m saddhindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m somanassindriya.m na  uppajjati. sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  saddhaavippayuttasomanassavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne ^a^M3.0148^ea^  nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m saddhindriya~nca na uppajjati  somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3010: [03] (ka) yassa somanassindriya.m na uppajjati tassa pa~n~nindriya.m  na uppajjatiiti?

text.3099: [03] acakkhukaana.m saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m  na ^a^M3.0154^ea^ uppajjati ^a^V3.0229^ea^, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.310: [03] suddhaavaasaana.m dutiye akusale citte vattamaane tesa.m tattha kusalaa  dhammaa na uppajjittha, no ca tesa.m tattha akusalaa dhammaa na  uppajjittha. suddhaavaasaana.m ^a^V3.0023^ea^ dutiye citte vattamaane asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  tattha kusalaa ca dhammaa na uppajjittha akusalaa ca dhammaa na  uppajjittha.
text.3100: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha ghaanindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3101: [03] aghaanakaana.m sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjati cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3102: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  itthindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3103: [03] acakkhukaana.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca taasa.m tattha itthindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati itthindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3104: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha itthindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3105: [03] na itthiina.m sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m ^a^T2.0254^ea^ na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m na itthiina.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  itthindriya~nca na uppajjati cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3106: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  purisindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3107: [03] acakkhukaana.m purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati purisindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3108: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha purisindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3109: [03] na purisaana.m sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m ^a^V3.0230^ea^ na purisaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  purisindriya~nca na uppajjati cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.311: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha akusalaa dhammaa na uppajjittha  tassa tattha kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjitthaati? aamantaa.
text.3110: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3111: [03] acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati,  no ca tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3112: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3113: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^T2.0255^ea^ ^a^M3.0155^ea^ yattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  somanassindriya.m na uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3114: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjati  tassa tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3115: [03] vinaa somanassena sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  somanassindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na  uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m vinaa somanassena acakkhukaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati  cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3116: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  upekkhindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3117: [03] acakkhukaana.m upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3118: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3119: [03] vinaa upekkhaaya sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  upekkhindriya.m ^a^V3.0231^ea^ na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na  uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m vinaa upekkhaaya acakkhukaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati cakkhundriya~nca  na uppajjati.
text.312: [03] (ka) yassa yattha kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjittha tassa tattha  abyaakataa dhammaa na uppajjitthaati?
text.3120: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m ^a^T2.0256^ea^ na uppajjatiiti?
text.3121: [03] acakkhukaana.m sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m ahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati saddhindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3122: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha saddhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3123: [03] ahetukaana.m sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m ahetukaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  saddhindriya~nca na uppajjati cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3124: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3125: [03] acakkhukaana.m ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati.  sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  tattha cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati pa~n~nindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3126: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati  ^a^M3.0156^ea^ tassa tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3127: [03] ~naa.navippayuttaana.m sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati.  sabbesa.m cavantaana.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  tattha pa~n~nindriya~nca ^a^T2.0257^ea^ na uppajjati cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3128: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^V3.0232^ea^ yattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  manindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3129: [03] acakkhukaana.m sacittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha manindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m acittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya~nca na  uppajjati manindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.313: [03] suddhaavaasaana.m dutiye citte vattamaane asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha  kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjittha, no ^a^T2.0053^ea^ ca tesa.m tattha abyaakataa dhammaa na  uppajjittha. suddhaavaasa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha kusalaa ca dhammaa na  uppajjittha abyaakataa ca dhammaa na uppajjittha.
text.3130: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti? aamantaa. (cakkhundriyamuulaka.m)

text.3132: [03] aghaanakaana.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca taasa.m tattha itthindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjati itthindriya~nca na uppajjati.

text.3134: [03] na itthiina.m saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m na itthiina.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  itthindriya~nca na uppajjati ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3135: [03] (ka) yassa yattha ghaanindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  purisindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3136: [03] aghaanakaana.m purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m ^a^T2.0258^ea^ na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjati purisindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3137: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha purisindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha ghaanindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3138: [03] na purisaana.m saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m na ^a^V3.0233^ea^ purisaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  purisindriya~nca na uppajjati ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjati.

text.314: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha abyaakataa dhammaa na uppajjittha  tassa tattha kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjitthaati? aamantaa.

text.3149: [03] vinaa upekkhaaya saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m na  uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m vinaa upekkhaaya aghaanakaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati ghaanindriya~nca  na uppajjati.

text.3155: [03] aghaanakaana.m ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjati pa~n~nindriya~nca na uppajjati.

text.316: [03] suddhaavaasaana.m dutiye citte vattamaane asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha  akusalaa dhammaa na uppajjittha, no ca tesa.m tattha abyaakataa dhammaa na  uppajjittha. suddhaavaasa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha akusalaa ca dhammaa  na uppajjittha abyaakataa ca dhammaa na uppajjittha.
