text.3173: [03] na itthiina.m upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m na itthiina.m vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  itthindriya~nca na uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3174: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha itthindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3175: [03] vinaa upekkhaaya itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m tattha  upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca taasa.m ^a^T2.0263^ea^ tattha itthindriya.m na  uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m vinaa ^a^V3.0237^ea^ upekkhaaya na itthiina.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati itthindriya~nca  na uppajjati.
text.3176: [03] (ka) yassa yattha itthindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3177: [03] na itthiina.m sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m na itthiina.m ahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha itthindriya~nca  na uppajjati saddhindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3178: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha saddhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha itthindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3179: [03] ahetukaana.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m tattha saddhindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca taasa.m tattha itthindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m ahetukaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha saddhindriya~nca  na uppajjati itthindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3180: [03] (ka) yassa yattha itthindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3181: [03] na itthiina.m ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m na itthiina.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  itthindriya~nca na uppajjati pa~n~nindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3182: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha itthindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3183: [03] ~naa.navippayuttaana.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m ^a^T2.0264^ea^ taasa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m  na uppajjati ^a^M3.0160^ea^, no ca taasa.m tattha itthindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  pa~n~nindriya~nca na uppajjati itthindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3184: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^V3.0238^ea^ yattha itthindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  manindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3185: [03] na itthiina.m sacittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha manindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m acittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha itthindriya~nca na  uppajjati manindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3186: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  itthindriya.m na uppajjatiiti? aamantaa. (itthindriyamuulaka.m)
text.3187: [03] 234^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha purisindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3188: [03] na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha purisindriya~nca na uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca na  uppajjati.
text.3189: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha purisindriya.m na uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3190: [03] (ka) yassa yattha purisindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  somanassindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3191: [03] na purisaana.m somanassena upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m na ^a^T2.0265^ea^ uppajjati.  sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na purisaana.m vinaa somanassena upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  tattha purisindriya~nca na uppajjati somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3192: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjati  tassa tattha purisindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3193: [03] vinaa somanassena purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  somanassindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m na  uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m vinaa somanassena na purisaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati  purisindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3194: [03] (ka) yassa yattha purisindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  upekkhindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3195: [03] na ^a^V3.0239^ea^ purisaana.m upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m na purisaana.m vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  purisindriya~nca na uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3196: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha purisindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3197: [03] vinaa upekkhaaya purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ^a^M3.0161^ea^ tattha  upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m na  uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m vinaa upekkhaaya na purisaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati purisindriya~nca  na uppajjati.
text.3198: [03] (ka) yassa yattha purisindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m ^a^T2.0266^ea^ na uppajjatiiti?
text.3199: [03] na purisaana.m sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m na purisaana.m ahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  purisindriya~nca na uppajjati saddhindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.320: [03] 57^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^M3.0016^ea^ kusalaa dhammaa uppajjissanti tassa  akusalaa dhammaa uppajjissantiiti?
text.3200: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha saddhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha purisindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3201: [03] ahetukaana.m purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m ahetukaana.m na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  saddhindriya~nca na uppajjati purisindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3202: [03] (ka) yassa yattha purisindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3203: [03] na purisaana.m ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  purisindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati.  sabbesa.m ^a^V3.0240^ea^ cavantaana.m na purisaana.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  tattha purisindriya~nca na uppajjati pa~n~nindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3204: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha purisindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3205: [03] ~naa.navippayuttaana.m purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  pa~n~nindriya~nca na uppajjati purisindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3206: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^T2.0267^ea^ yattha purisindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  manindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3207: [03] na purisaana.m sacittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha manindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cavantaana.m acittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha purisindriya~nca na  uppajjati manindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3208: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  purisindriya.m na uppajjatiiti? aamantaa. (purisindriyamuulaka.m)
text.3209: [03] 235^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.321: [03] yassa ^a^V3.0024^ea^ cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m  kusalaa dhammaa uppajjissanti, no ca tesa.m akusalaa dhammaa  uppajjissanti. itaresa.m tesa.m kusalaa ca dhammaa uppajjissanti  akusalaa ca dhammaa uppajjissanti.
text.3210: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjati  tassa tattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3211: [03] vinaa somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte ^a^M3.0162^ea^  somanassavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati.  sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3212: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^V3.0241^ea^ yattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  upekkhindriya.m na uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3213: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3214: [03] vinaa upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m pavatte upekkhaavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  ^a^T2.0268^ea^  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca  na uppajjati.
text.3215: [03] (ka) yassa yattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m na uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3216: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha saddhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3217: [03] ahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte saddhaavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha saddhindriya~nca na uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca na  uppajjati.
text.3218: [03] (ka) yassa yattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3219: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.322: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana akusalaa dhammaa uppajjissanti tassa  kusalaa dhammaa uppajjissantiiti? aamantaa.
text.3220: [03] ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte ~naa.navippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya~nca na uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca na  uppajjati.
text.3221: [03] (ka) yassa yattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  manindriya.m ^a^T2.0269^ea^ na uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3222: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3223: [03] acittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha manindriya.m na uppajjati,  no ca tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cavantaana.m  pavatte cittassa ^a^V3.0242^ea^ bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha manindriya~nca na uppajjati  jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjati. (jiivitindriyamuulaka.m)
text.3224: [03] 236^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^M3.0163^ea^ yattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3225: [03] upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m pavatte upekkhaasampayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m  tattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  somanassavippayuttaupekkhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m  tesa.m tattha somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca na  uppajjati.
text.3226: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3227: [03] somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte somanassasampayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  somanassindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  upekkhaavippayuttasomanassavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m  tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati somanassindriya~nca na  uppajjati.
text.3228: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^T2.0270^ea^ yattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3229: [03] vinaa somanassena sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  somanassavippayuttasaddhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  somanassindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m na  uppajjati. sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  somanassavippayuttasaddhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m  tesa.m tattha somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati saddhindriya~nca na  uppajjati.
text.323: [03] (ka) yassa kusalaa dhammaa uppajjissanti tassa abyaakataa  dhammaa uppajjissantiiti? aamantaa.
text.3230: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha saddhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3231: [03] pavatte saddhaavippayuttasomanassasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne  tesa.m ^a^V3.0243^ea^ tattha saddhindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  somanassindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  saddhaavippayuttasomanassavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m  tesa.m tattha saddhindriya~nca na uppajjati somanassindriya~nca na  uppajjati.
text.3232: [03] (ka) yassa yattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3233: [03] vinaa somanassena ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  somanassavippayutta~naa.nasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  somanassindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m na  uppajjati. sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  somanassavippayutta~naa.navippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m ^a^T2.0271^ea^  tesa.m tattha somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati pa~n~nindriya~nca na  uppajjati.
text.3234: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha somanassindriya.m ^a^M3.0164^ea^ na uppajjatiiti?
text.3235: [03] ~naa.navippayuttaana.m somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte  ~naa.navippayuttasomanassasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m na  uppajjati. sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  ~naa.navippayuttasomanassavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m  tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya~nca na uppajjati somanassindriya~nca na  uppajjati.
text.3236: [03] (ka) yassa yattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  manindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3237: [03] vinaa somanassena sacittakaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  somanassavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha manindriya.m na uppajjati. sabbesa.m  cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha somanassindriya~nca na  uppajjati manindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3238: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V3.0244^ea^ vaa pana yattha manindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  somanassindriya.m na uppajjatiiti? aamantaa.  (somanassindriyamuulaka.m)
text.3239: [03] 237^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha saddhindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.324: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa ^a^T2.0054^ea^ uppajjissanti tassa  kusalaa dhammaa uppajjissantiiti?
text.3240: [03] vinaa upekkhaaya sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  upekkhaavippayuttasaddhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m ^a^T2.0272^ea^ tattha  upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m na  uppajjati. sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  upekkhaavippayuttasaddhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  tattha upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati saddhindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3241: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha saddhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3242: [03] ahetukaana.m upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m pavatte  saddhaavippayuttaupekkhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  saddhindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m na  uppajjati. sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  saddhaavippayuttaupekkhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  tattha saddhindriya~nca na uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3243: [03] (ka) yassa yattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3244: [03] vinaa upekkhaaya ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  upekkhaavippayutta~naa.nasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m na  uppajjati. sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  upekkhaavippayutta~naa.navippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  tattha ^a^M3.0165^ea^ upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati pa~n~nindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3245: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V3.0245^ea^ vaa pana yattha pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.3246: [03] ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m pavatte ^a^T2.0273^ea^  ~naa.navippayuttaupekkhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m na  uppajjati. sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  ~naa.navippayuttaupekkhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  tattha pa~n~nindriya~nca na uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.3247: [03] (ka) yassa yattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  manindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?

text.3721: [03] ruupaavacaraana.m ye ca purisaa eteneva bhaavena katici bhave  dassetvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjissati,  no ca tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m kaamaavacaraana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya~nca uppajjissati itthindriya~nca uppajjissati.

text.3723: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^M3.0194^ea^ yattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjissati tassa tattha  purisindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.3724: [03] ruupaavacaraana.m yaa ca itthiyo eteneva bhaavena katici bhave  dassetvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjissati,  no ca tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m kaamaavacaraana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya~nca uppajjissati purisindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.3725: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha purisindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  tattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjissatiiti? aamantaa.

text.3727: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha jiivitindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  tattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjissatiiti?

text.3729: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjissati tassa tattha  somanassindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.373: [03] aggamaggasama"ngiina.m arahantaana.m yassa ^a^T2.0059^ea^ cittassa anantaraa  aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha akusalaa dhammaa  na uppajjissanti, no ca tesa.m tattha abyaakataa dhammaa na  uppajjissanti. pacchimacittasama"ngiina.m tesa.m tattha akusalaa ca dhammaa  na uppajjissanti abyaakataa ca dhammaa na uppajjissanti.
text.3730: [03] ye sacakkhukaa upekkhaaya upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m  tattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m  uppajjissati. itaresa.m pa~ncavokaaraana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya~nca  uppajjissati somanassindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.3731: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha somanassindriya.m uppajjissati  tassa tattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.3732: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjissati tassa tattha  upekkhindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?

text.3974: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha ghaanindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa  tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.3975: [03] ruupaavacaraana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca  tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjissati. pa~ncavokaare  pacchimabhavikaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya~nca na  uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.3976: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjissati tassa tattha  itthindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti? aamantaa.

text.3978: [03] ruupaavacaraana.m ye ca purisaa eteneva bhaavena katici bhave  dassetvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m na uppajjissati,  no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjissati. pa~ncavokaare  pacchimabhavikaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha itthindriya~nca na  uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca ^a^T2.0352^ea^ na uppajjissati.
text.3979: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjissati tassa tattha  purisindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti? aamantaa.

text.3981: [03] ruupaavacaraana.m ^a^V3.0315^ea^ yaa ca itthiyo eteneva bhaavena katici bhave  dassetvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m na  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjissati.  pa~ncavokaare pacchimabhavikaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha  purisindriya~nca na uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.3982: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjissati tassa tattha  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.3983: [03] asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjissati.  pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjissati  jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.3984: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjissati  tassa tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjissatiiti? aamantaa.

text.3987: [03] ye sacakkhukaa upekkhaaya upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti ^a^T2.0353^ea^ tesa.m  tattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjissati ^a^M3.0213^ea^, no ca tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya.m na uppajjissati. pa~ncavokaare pacchimabhavikaana.m  asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha somanassindriya~nca na  uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjissati.

text.4227: [03] catuvokaaraa pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  tesa.m tattha manindriya.m uppajjittha, no ca tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m  uppajjati. catuvokaara.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha manindriya~nca uppajjittha jiivitindriya~nca  uppajjati. text.4228: [03] 350^b^.^eb^ yassa yattha somanassindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  upekkhindriya.m...pe0... saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0...  manindriya.m uppajjitthaati? aamantaa.

text.423: [03] (ka) yassa kusalaa dhammaa uppajjanti tassa abyaakataa dhammaa  uppajjissantiiti? aamantaa.
text.4230: [03] sabbesa.m ^a^T2.0385^ea^ cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne somanassavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha manindriya.m uppajjittha, no ca tesa.m tattha  somanassindriya.m ^a^V3.0342^ea^ uppajjati. somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte  somanassasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha manindriya~nca  uppajjittha somanassindriya~nca uppajjati. text.4231: [03] 351^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^M3.0231^ea^ yattha upekkhindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m uppajjitthaati?
text.4232: [03] suddhaavaasa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m uppajjati, no  ca tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m uppajjittha. itaresa.m upekkhaaya  upapajjantaana.m pavatte upekkhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati saddhindriya~nca uppajjittha.

text.4244: [03] suddhaavaasa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m uppajjati, no  ca tesa.m tattha manindriya.m ^a^M3.0232^ea^ uppajjittha. itaresa.m sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m  pavatte saddhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha saddhindriya~nca  uppajjati manindriya~nca uppajjittha.
text.4245: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m uppajjittha tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m uppajjatiiti?

text.4247: [03] 353^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  manindriya.m uppajjitthaati?
text.4248: [03] suddhaavaasa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati, no  ca tesa.m tattha manindriya.m uppajjittha. itaresa.m ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m  upapajjantaana.m pavatte ~naa.nasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati manindriya~nca uppajjittha.

(pa~n~nindriyamuulaka.m)

text.427: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V3.0034^ea^ vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa uppajjissanti tassa  akusalaa dhammaa uppajjantiiti?
text.4270: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m ^a^V3.0346^ea^ tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha sotindriya.m na  uppajjittha. suddhaavaase parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m  tattha cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati sotindriya~nca na uppajjittha.

text.4272: [03] suddhaavaasa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha sotindriya.m na uppajjittha,  no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati. suddhaavaase  parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha sotindriya~nca na  uppajjittha cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati.

text.4274: [03] kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m na  uppajjittha. ruupaavacaraa cavantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjittha.

text.433: [03] aggamaggassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa aggamagga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha kusalaa dhammaa  uppajjanti, no ca tesa.m tattha akusalaa dhammaa uppajjissanti.  itaresa.m ^a^M3.0024^ea^ kusalaana.m uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha kusalaa ca dhammaa uppajjanti  akusalaa ca dhammaa uppajjissanti.

text.4359: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca aruupa.m  upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m sotindriya.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m  sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati  sotindriya~nca uppajjissati.

text.4368: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana itthindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  cakkhundriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4369: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m cakkhundriya.m uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya~nca uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca  uppajjati.

text.4372: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m jiivitindriya.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m  sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati  jiivitindriya~nca uppajjissati.

text.4376: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca sacakkhukaa  upekkhaaya upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  cakkhundriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m somanassindriya.m uppajjissati.  itaresa.m sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati  somanassindriya~nca uppajjissati.

text.4378: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  somanassindriya.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m cakkhundriya.m uppajjati.  sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m somanassindriya~nca uppajjissati  cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati.
text.4379: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhundriya.m uppajjati tassa upekkhindriya.m  uppajjissatiiti?
text.438: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne kusalavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha abyaakataa dhammaa  uppajjissanti, no ca tesa.m tattha kusalaa dhammaa uppajjanti.  kusalaana.m uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha abyaakataa ca dhammaa uppajjissanti  kusalaa ca dhammaa uppajjanti.
text.4380: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca sacakkhukaa  somanassena upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  cakkhundriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m upekkhindriya.m uppajjissati.  itaresa.m sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati  upekkhindriya~nca uppajjissati.

text.4382: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m cakkhundriya.m uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya~nca uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca  uppajjati.

text.4391: [03] (ka) yassa ghaanindriya.m uppajjati tassa purisindriya.m  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4392: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca ruupaavacara.m  aruupaavacara.m upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti yaa ca itthiyo eteneva  bhaavena katici bhave dassetvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m ghaanindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m purisindriya.m uppajjissati.  itaresa.m saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya~nca ^a^T2.0395^ea^ uppajjati  purisindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4393: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana purisindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  ghaanindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4394: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m ghaanindriya.m uppajjati ^a^M3.0243^ea^. saghaanakaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya~nca uppajjissati ghaanindriya~nca  uppajjati.
text.4395: [03] (ka) yassa ghaanindriya.m uppajjati tassa jiivitindriya.m  uppajjissatiiti?

text.4398: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m jiivitindriya.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m ghaanindriya.m uppajjati. saghaanakaana.m  upapajjantaana.m ^a^V3.0360^ea^ tesa.m jiivitindriya~nca uppajjissati ghaanindriya~nca  uppajjati.

text.4400: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca saghaanakaa  upekkhaaya upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  ghaanindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m somanassindriya.m uppajjissati.  itaresa.m saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati  somanassindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4401: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana somanassindriya.m ^a^T2.0396^ea^ uppajjissati tassa  ghaanindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4402: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  somanassindriya.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m ghaanindriya.m uppajjati.  saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m somanassindriya~nca uppajjissati  ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.4403: [03] (ka) yassa ghaanindriya.m uppajjati tassa upekkhindriya.m  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4404: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca saghaanakaa  somanassena upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  ghaanindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m upekkhindriya.m uppajjissati.  itaresa.m saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati  upekkhindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4405: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana upekkhindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  ghaanindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4406: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m ghaanindriya.m uppajjati. saghaanakaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya~nca uppajjissati ghaanindriya~nca  uppajjati.
text.4407: [03] yassa ^a^V3.0361^ea^ ghaanindriya.m uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m...pe0...  pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... ^a^T2.0397^ea^ manindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4408: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya.m  uppajjati ^a^M3.0244^ea^, no ca tesa.m manindriya.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m  saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati manindriya~nca  uppajjissati.
text.4409: [03] yassa vaa pana manindriya.m uppajjissati tassa ghaanindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.441: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne akusalavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha abyaakataa dhammaa  uppajjissanti, no ca tesa.m tattha akusalaa dhammaa uppajjanti.  akusalaana.m uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha abyaakataa ca dhammaa  uppajjissanti akusalaa ^a^T2.0066^ea^ ca dhammaa uppajjanti.
text.4410: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m manindriya.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m ghaanindriya.m uppajjati. saghaanakaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m manindriya~nca uppajjissati ghaanindriya~nca  uppajjati. (ghaanindriyamuulaka.m)
text.4411: [03] 368^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa itthindriya.m uppajjati tassa purisindriya.m  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4412: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m yaa ca itthiyo  ruupaavacara.m aruupaavacara.m upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti yaa ca  itthiyo eteneva bhaavena katici bhave dassetvaa parinibbaayissanti  taasa.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m itthindriya.m uppajjati, no ca taasa.m  purisindriya.m uppajjissati. itaraasa.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m  itthindriya~nca uppajjati purisindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4413: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana purisindriya.m uppajjissati ^a^T2.0398^ea^ tassa  itthindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4414: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m itthindriya.m uppajjati. itthiina.m  upapajjantiina.m taasa.m purisindriya~nca uppajjissati itthindriya~nca  uppajjati.
text.4415: [03] (ka) yassa itthindriya.m uppajjati tassa jiivitindriya.m  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4416: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m itthindriya.m  uppajjati, no ^a^V3.0362^ea^ ca taasa.m jiivitindriya.m uppajjissati. itaraasa.m  itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m itthindriya~nca uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca  uppajjissati.
text.4417: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana jiivitindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  itthindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4418: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m jiivitindriya.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m itthindriya.m uppajjati. itthiina.m  upapajjantiina.m taasa.m jiivitindriya~nca uppajjissati itthindriya~nca  uppajjati.
text.4419: [03] (ka) yassa itthindriya.m uppajjati tassa somanassindriya.m  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4420: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m yaa ca itthiyo  upekkhaaya upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti taasa.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m  itthindriya.m uppajjati, no ca taasa.m somanassindriya.m uppajjissati.  itaraasa.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m itthindriya~nca uppajjati  somanassindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4421: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana somanassindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  itthindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4422: [03] sabbesa.m ^a^T2.0399^ea^ cavantaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  somanassindriya.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m itthindriya.m uppajjati.  itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m somanassindriya~nca uppajjissati  itthindriya~nca uppajjati.

text.4424: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m yaa ca itthiyo  somanassena upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti taasa.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m  itthindriya.m uppajjati, no ca taasa.m upekkhindriya.m uppajjissati.  itaraasa.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m itthindriya~nca uppajjati  upekkhindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4425: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana upekkhindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  itthindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4426: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya.m  uppajjissati ^a^V3.0363^ea^, no ca tesa.m itthindriya.m uppajjati. itthiina.m  upapajjantiina.m taasa.m upekkhindriya~nca uppajjissati itthindriya~nca  uppajjati.
text.4427: [03] yassa itthindriya.m uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m...pe0...  pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... ^a^T2.0400^ea^ manindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4428: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m itthindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca taasa.m manindriya.m uppajjissati. itaraasa.m itthiina.m  upapajjantiina.m taasa.m itthindriya~nca uppajjati manindriya~nca  uppajjissati.
text.4429: [03] yassa vaa pana manindriya.m uppajjissati tassa itthindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.443: [03] 84^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjanti tassa akusalaa  dhammaa na uppajjissantiiti?
text.4430: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m manindriya.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m itthindriya.m uppajjati. itthiina.m  upapajjantiina.m taasa.m manindriya~nca uppajjissati itthindriya~nca  uppajjati. (itthindriyamuulaka.m)
text.4431: [03] 369^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa purisindriya.m uppajjati tassa  jiivitindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4432: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m jiivitindriya.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m  purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya~nca uppajjati  jiivitindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4433: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana jiivitindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  purisindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4434: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m jiivitindriya.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m purisindriya.m uppajjati. purisaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m jiivitindriya~nca uppajjissati purisindriya~nca  uppajjati.
text.4435: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^T2.0401^ea^ purisindriya.m uppajjati tassa somanassindriya.m  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4436: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca purisaa  upekkhaaya upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  purisindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m somanassindriya.m uppajjissati.  itaresa.m purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m ^a^V3.0364^ea^ tesa.m purisindriya~nca uppajjati  somanassindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4437: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana somanassindriya.m uppajjissati, tassa  purisindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4438: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na ^a^M3.0246^ea^ purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  somanassindriya.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m purisindriya.m uppajjati.  purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m somanassindriya~nca uppajjissati  purisindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.4439: [03] (ka) yassa purisindriya.m uppajjati tassa upekkhindriya.m  uppajjissatiiti?
text.444: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne kusalavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m kusalaa dhammaa na  uppajjanti, no ca tesa.m akusalaa dhammaa na uppajjissanti.  aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m yassa cittassa anantaraa  aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m kusalaa ca  dhammaa na uppajjanti akusalaa ca dhammaa na uppajjissanti.
text.4440: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca purisaa  somanassena upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  purisindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m upekkhindriya.m uppajjissati.  itaresa.m purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya~nca uppajjati  upekkhindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4441: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana upekkhindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  purisindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4442: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m purisindriya.m uppajjati. purisaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya~nca ^a^T2.0402^ea^ uppajjissati purisindriya~nca  uppajjati.
text.4443: [03] yassa purisindriya.m uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m...pe0...  pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... manindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4444: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m manindriya.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m purisaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya~nca uppajjati manindriya~nca  uppajjissati.
text.4445: [03] yassa ^a^V3.0365^ea^ vaa pana manindriya.m uppajjissati tassa purisindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.4446: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m manindriya.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m purisindriya.m uppajjati. purisaana.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m manindriya~nca uppajjissati purisindriya~nca  uppajjati. (purisindriyamuulaka.m)
text.4447: [03] 370^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa jiivitindriya.m uppajjati tassa  somanassindriya.m uppajjissatiiti ^a^T2.0403^ea^?
text.4448: [03] pacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa  upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati tassa cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m jiivitindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m  somanassindriya.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m jiivitindriya~nca uppajjati somanassindriya~nca  uppajjissati.
text.4449: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana somanassindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  jiivitindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.445: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana akusalaa dhammaa na uppajjissanti tassa  kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjantiiti?
text.4450: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  somanassindriya.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m jiivitindriya.m uppajjati.  sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  somanassindriya~nca uppajjissati jiivitindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.4451: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^M3.0247^ea^ jiivitindriya.m uppajjati tassa upekkhindriya.m  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4452: [03] pacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa  somanassasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati tassa cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m jiivitindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m upekkhindriya.m  uppajjissati. itaresa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne  tesa.m jiivitindriya~nca uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4453: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana upekkhindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  jiivitindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4454: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m upekkhindriya.m  uppajjissati ^a^V3.0366^ea^, no ca tesa.m jiivitindriya.m uppajjati. sabbesa.m  upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m ^a^T2.0404^ea^ upekkhindriya~nca  uppajjissati jiivitindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.4455: [03] yassa jiivitindriya.m uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m...pe0...  pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... manindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4456: [03] pacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m jiivitindriya.m uppajjati, no  ca tesa.m manindriya.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m jiivitindriya~nca uppajjati manindriya~nca  uppajjissati.
text.4457: [03] yassa vaa pana manindriya.m uppajjissati tassa jiivitindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.4458: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m manindriya.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m jiivitindriya.m uppajjati. sabbesa.m  upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m manindriya~nca  uppajjissati jiivitindriya~nca uppajjati. (jiivitindriyamuulaka.m)
text.4459: [03] 371^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa somanassindriya.m uppajjati tassa  upekkhindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.446: [03] aggamaggassa ^a^V3.0036^ea^ uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa ^a^M3.0025^ea^ aggamagga.m  pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m akusalaa dhammaa na  uppajjissanti, no ca tesa.m kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjanti.  aggamaggassa bha"ngakkha.ne arahantaana.m yassa cittassa anantaraa  aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tassa cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m akusalaa  ca dhammaa na uppajjissanti kusalaa ca dhammaa na uppajjanti.
text.4460: [03] somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa  anantaraa somanassasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati tassa cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m somanassindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m  upekkhindriya.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m somanassena upapajjantaana.m  pavatte somanassasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  somanassindriya~nca uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4461: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana upekkhindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  somanassindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4462: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne somanassavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne ^a^T2.0405^ea^ nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m somanassindriya.m uppajjati. somanassena  upapajjantaana.m pavatte somanassasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  upekkhindriya~nca uppajjissati somanassindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.4463: [03] yassa ^a^V3.0367^ea^ ^a^M3.0248^ea^ somanassindriya.m uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m...pe0...  pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... manindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4464: [03] somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  somanassindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m manindriya.m uppajjissati.  itaresa.m somanassena upapajjantaana.m pavatte somanassasampayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m somanassindriya~nca uppajjati manindriya~nca  uppajjissati.
text.4465: [03] yassa vaa pana manindriya.m uppajjissati tassa somanassindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.4466: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne somanassavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m manindriya.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m somanassindriya.m uppajjati. somanassena  upapajjantaana.m pavatte somanassasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  manindriya~nca uppajjissati somanassindriya~nca uppajjati.  (somanassindriyamuulaka.m)
text.4467: [03] 372^b^.^eb^ yassa upekkhindriya.m uppajjati tassa  saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... manindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4468: [03] upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m upekkhindriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m manindriya.m uppajjissati ^a^T2.0406^ea^. itaresa.m upekkhaaya  upapajjantaana.m pavatte upekkhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati manindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4469: [03] yassa vaa pana manindriya.m uppajjissati tassa upekkhindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.447: [03] (ka) yassa kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjanti tassa abyaakataa  dhammaa na uppajjissantiiti?
text.4470: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne upekkhaavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m manindriya.m  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m upekkhindriya.m uppajjati. upekkhaaya  upapajjantaana.m pavatte upekkhaasampayuttacittassa ^a^V3.0368^ea^ uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  manindriya~nca uppajjissati upekkhindriya~nca ^a^T2.0407^ea^ uppajjati.  (upekkhindriyamuulaka.m)
text.4471: [03] 373^b^.^eb^ yassa saddhindriya.m uppajjati tassa pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0...  manindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4472: [03] pacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m saddhindriya.m uppajjati, no  ca tesa.m manindriya.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m  pavatte saddhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m saddhindriya~nca  uppajjati manindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4473: [03] yassa vaa pana manindriya.m uppajjissati tassa saddhindriya.m  uppajjatiiti?
text.4474: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne saddhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne  nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m manindriya.m uppajjissati, no  ca tesa.m saddhindriya.m uppajjati. sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  saddhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m manindriya~nca uppajjissati  saddhindriya~nca uppajjati. (saddhindriyamuulaka.m)
text.4475: [03] 374^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^M3.0249^ea^ pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati tassa manindriya.m  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4476: [03] pacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati, no  ca tesa.m manindriya.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m  upapajjantaana.m pavatte ~naa.nasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m  pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati manindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4477: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana manindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4478: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne ~naa.navippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne  nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m manindriya.m uppajjissati ^a^T2.0408^ea^, no  ca tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati. ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  ~naa.nasampayuttacittassa ^a^V3.0369^ea^ uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m manindriya~nca uppajjissati  pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati. (pa~n~nindriyamuulaka.m)
text.448: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne kusalavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m kusalaa dhammaa na  uppajjanti, no ca tesa.m abyaakataa dhammaa na uppajjissanti.  pacchimacittasama"ngiina.m tesa.m kusalaa ca dhammaa na ^a^T2.0067^ea^ uppajjanti abyaakataa  ca dhammaa na uppajjissanti.
text.4480: [03] 375^b^.^eb^ yattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjati tattha sotindriya.m  uppajjissatiiti?...pe0....
text.4482: [03] 376^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  sotindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4483: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha sotindriya.m uppajjissati.  itaresa.m sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati  sotindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4484: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha sotindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  tattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4485: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha sotindriya.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m  uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha sotindriya~nca  uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati.
text.4486: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  ghaanindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4487: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ruupaavacara.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  ghaanindriya.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m sacakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati ghaanindriya~nca  uppajjissati.
text.4488: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V3.0370^ea^ vaa pana yattha ghaanindriya.m uppajjissati tassa   ^a^T2.0409^ea^ tattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4489: [03] kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha ^a^M3.0250^ea^ cakkhundriya.m  uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  ghaanindriya~nca uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati.
text.449: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa na uppajjissanti tassa  kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjantiiti? aamantaa.
text.4490: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  itthindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4491: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ruupaavacara.m  upapajjantaana.m ye ca purisaa eteneva bhaavena katici bhave dassetvaa  parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m  sacakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya~nca  uppajjati itthindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4492: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha itthindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  tattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4493: [03] kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m  uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  itthindriya~nca uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati.
text.4494: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  purisindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4495: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ruupaavacara.m  upapajjantaana.m yaa ca itthiyo eteneva bhaavena katici bhave ^a^T2.0410^ea^ dassetvaa  parinibbaayissanti taasa.m upapajjantiina.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m  sacakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m ^a^V3.0371^ea^ upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya~nca  uppajjati purisindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4496: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha purisindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  tattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4497: [03] kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m  uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  purisindriya~nca uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati.
text.4498: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  jiivitindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4499: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m uppajjissati.  itaresa.m sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya~nca  uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.450: [03] 85^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa akusalaa dhammaa na uppajjanti tassa  abyaakataa dhammaa na uppajjissantiiti?
text.4500: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha jiivitindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  tattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4501: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  jiivitindriya.m uppajjissati ^a^M3.0251^ea^, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjati.  sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya~nca  uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati.
text.4502: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  somanassindriya.m ^a^T2.0411^ea^ uppajjissatiiti?
text.4503: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca sacakkhukaa  upekkhaaya upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  tattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m  uppajjissati. itaresa.m sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati somanassindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4504: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V3.0372^ea^ vaa pana yattha somanassindriya.m uppajjissati  tassa tattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4505: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya.m uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  somanassindriya~nca uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati.
text.4506: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  upekkhindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4507: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca sacakkhukaa  somanassena upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  tattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m  uppajjissati. itaresa.m sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4508: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha upekkhindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  tattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4509: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m uppajjissati, no ^a^T2.0412^ea^ ca tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya.m uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  upekkhindriya~nca uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati.
text.451: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne akusalavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m akusalaa dhammaa na  uppajjanti, no ca tesa.m abyaakataa dhammaa na uppajjissanti.  pacchimacittasama"ngiina.m tesa.m akusalaa ca dhammaa na uppajjanti  abyaakataa ca dhammaa na uppajjissanti.
text.4510: [03] yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... manindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4511: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha manindriya.m uppajjissati.  itaresa.m sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati  manindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4512: [03] yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m uppajjissati tassa tattha  cakkhundriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4513: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha manindriya.m uppajjissati, no ^a^T2.0413^ea^ ca tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya.m ^a^V3.0373^ea^ uppajjati. sacakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  manindriya.m uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca uppajjati.  (cakkhundriyamuulaka.m)
text.4514: [03] 377^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^M3.0252^ea^ yattha ghaanindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  itthindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4515: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca purisaa eteneva  bhaavena katici bhave dassetvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m  uppajjissati. itaresa.m saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati itthindriya~nca uppajjissati.

text.4518: [03] (ka) yassa yattha ghaanindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  purisindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4519: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m yaa ca itthiyo  eteneva bhaavena katici bhave dassetvaa parinibbaayissanti taasa.m  upapajjantiina.m tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  purisindriya.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  tattha ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati purisindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.452: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa na uppajjissanti tassa  akusalaa dhammaa na uppajjantiiti? aamantaa.
text.4520: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha purisindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  tattha ghaanindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4521: [03] kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  tattha purisindriya.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m  uppajjati. saghaanakaana.m ^a^V3.0374^ea^ upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha purisindriya~nca  uppajjissati ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.4522: [03] (ka) yassa yattha ghaanindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  jiivitindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4523: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  ghaanindriya.m uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m uppajjissati.  itaresa.m saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya~nca  uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4524: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha jiivitindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  tattha ghaanindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4525: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  jiivitindriya.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m uppajjati.  saghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya~nca uppajjissati  ghaanindriya~nca uppajjati.
text.4526: [03] (ka) yassa yattha ghaanindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  somanassindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?

text.4597: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne upekkhaavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha manindriya.m uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha  upekkhindriya.m uppajjati. upekkhaaya upapajjantaana.m pavatte  upekkhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha manindriya~nca  uppajjissati upekkhindriya~nca uppajjati. (upekkhindriyamuulaka.m)
text.4598: [03] 383^b^.^eb^ yassa ^a^T2.0427^ea^ ^a^M3.0259^ea^ yattha saddhindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... manindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4599: [03] pacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m uppajjati,  no ca tesa.m tattha manindriya.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m sahetukaana.m  upapajjantaana.m pavatte saddhaasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  saddhindriya~nca uppajjati manindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.460: [03] (ka) yassa yattha kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjanti tassa tattha  abyaakataa dhammaa na uppajjissantiiti?
text.4600: [03] yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m uppajjissati tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m uppajjatiiti?
text.4601: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne saddhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne  tesa.m tattha manindriya.m ^a^T2.0428^ea^ uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m  uppajjati. sahetukaana.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte saddhaasampayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha manindriya~nca uppajjissati saddhindriya~nca  uppajjati. text.4602: [03] 384^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V3.0384^ea^ yattha pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati tassa tattha  manindriya.m uppajjissatiiti?
text.4603: [03] pacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjati,  no ca tesa.m tattha manindriya.m uppajjissati. itaresa.m ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m  upapajjantaana.m pavatte ~naa.nasampayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  pa~n~nindriya~nca uppajjati manindriya~nca uppajjissati.
text.4604: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m uppajjissati tassa  tattha pa~n~nindriya.m uppajjatiiti?

text.4607: [03] 385^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa sotindriya.m  na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4608: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m sotindriya.m na uppajjissati.  pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca aruupa.m  upapajjitvaa ^a^T2.0429^ea^ parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya~nca na  uppajjati sotindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4609: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana sotindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa  cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.461: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne kusalavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjanti,  no ca tesa.m tattha abyaakataa ^a^V3.0038^ea^ dhammaa na uppajjissanti.  pacchimacittasama"ngiina.m tesa.m tattha kusalaa ca dhammaa na uppajjanti  abyaakataa ca dhammaa na uppajjissanti.
text.4610: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca aruupa.m  upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m sotindriya.m na  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati. pa~ncavokaare  parinibbantaana.m ^a^V3.0385^ea^ aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ^a^M3.0260^ea^ ca aruupa.m upapajjitvaa  parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m sotindriya~nca na  uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.4611: [03] (ka) yassa cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa ghaanindriya.m na  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4612: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m cakkhundriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m ghaanindriya.m na uppajjissati.  pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca ruupaavacara.m  aruupaavacara.m upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m  cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4613: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana ghaanindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa  cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.4614: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca ruupaavacara.m  aruupaavacara.m upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  ghaanindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati.  pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ^a^T2.0430^ea^ ca  ruupaavacara.m aruupaavacara.m upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m  tesa.m ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati.

text.4658: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca saghaanakaa  somanassena upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m ghaanindriya.m na uppajjati.  kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m  ye ca somanassena upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m  tesa.m upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjissati ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.4659: [03] yassa ghaanindriya.m na uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m...pe0...  pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... manindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4660: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m ghaanindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m manindriya.m na uppajjissati. kaamaavacare  parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m  ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjati manindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4661: [03] yassa vaa pana manindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa ghaanindriya.m  ^a^M3.0265^ea^ na uppajjatiiti?
text.4662: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m manindriya.m na  uppajjissati ^a^V3.0392^ea^, no ca tesa.m ghaanindriya.m na uppajjati. kaamaavacare  parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m  manindriya~nca na uppajjissati ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjati. text.4663: [03] 387^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa itthindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  purisindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4664: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya.m ^a^T2.0439^ea^ na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m purisindriya.m na uppajjissati. kaamaavacare  parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca  ruupaavacara.m aruupaavacara.m upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti yaa ca  itthiyo eteneva bhaavena katici bhave dassetvaa parinibbaayissanti  tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya~nca na uppajjati purisindriya~nca na  uppajjissati.
text.4665: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana purisindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa  itthindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.4666: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m yaa ca itthiyo  ruupaavacara.m aruupaavacara.m upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti yaa ca  itthiyo eteneva bhaavena katici bhave dassetvaa parinibbaayissanti  taasa.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m purisindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca taasa.m  itthindriya.m na uppajjati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare  aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca ruupaavacara.m aruupaavacara.m  upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti yaa ca itthiyo eteneva bhaavena  katici bhave dassetvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m  purisindriya~nca na uppajjissati itthindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.4667: [03] (ka) yassa itthindriya.m na uppajjati tassa jiivitindriya.m na  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4668: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m jiivitindriya.m na uppajjissati. kaamaavacare  parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m  itthindriya~nca na uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4669: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^T2.0440^ea^ vaa pana jiivitindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa  itthindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.4670: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m jiivitindriya.m na  uppajjissati ^a^V3.0393^ea^, no ca taasa.m itthindriya.m na uppajjati. kaamaavacare  parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m  jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjissati itthindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.4671: [03] (ka) yassa itthindriya.m na uppajjati tassa somanassindriya.m  na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4672: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ^a^M3.0266^ea^ ca tesa.m somanassindriya.m na uppajjissati.  kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m ye  ca upekkhaaya upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m  itthindriya~nca na uppajjati somanassindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4673: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana somanassindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa  itthindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.4674: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m yaa ca itthiyo  upekkhaaya upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti taasa.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m  somanassindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca taasa.m itthindriya.m na  uppajjati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare  pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca upekkhaaya upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti  tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m somanassindriya~nca na uppajjissati  itthindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.4675: [03] (ka) yassa itthindriya.m na uppajjati tassa upekkhindriya.m na  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4676: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya.m ^a^T2.0441^ea^ na  uppajjati no ca tesa.m upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissati. kaamaavacare  parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca  somanassena upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m  itthindriya~nca na uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4677: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa  itthindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.4678: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m ^a^V3.0394^ea^ itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m yaa ca itthiyo  somanassena upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti taasa.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m  upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca taasa.m itthindriya.m na uppajjati.  kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m  ye ca somanassena upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m  tesa.m upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjissati itthindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.4679: [03] yassa itthindriya.m na uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m...pe0...  pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... manindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.468: [03] 89^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa kusalaa dhammaa uppajjittha tassa akusalaa  dhammaa uppajjissantiiti?
text.4680: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na itthiina.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m itthindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m manindriya.m na uppajjissati. kaamaavacare  parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m  itthindriya~nca na uppajjati manindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4681: [03] yassa vaa pana manindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa itthindriya.m  na uppajjatiiti?
text.4682: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m taasa.m manindriya.m na  uppajjissati, no ca taasa.m itthindriya.m na uppajjati. kaamaavacare  parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m ^a^T2.0442^ea^ tesa.m  manindriya~nca na uppajjissati itthindriya~nca na uppajjati.
