text.4683: [03] 388^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^M3.0267^ea^ purisindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4684: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m jiivitindriya.m na uppajjissati.  kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m  tesa.m purisindriya~nca na uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4685: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V3.0395^ea^ vaa pana jiivitindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa  purisindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.4686: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m jiivitindriya.m na  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m purisindriya.m na uppajjati. kaamaavacare  parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m  jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjissati purisindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.4687: [03] (ka) yassa purisindriya.m na uppajjati tassa somanassindriya.m  na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4688: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m somanassindriya.m na uppajjissati.  kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m ye  ca upekkhaaya upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m  purisindriya~nca na uppajjati somanassindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4689: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana somanassindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa  purisindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.469: [03] aggamaggasama"ngiina.m arahantaana.m yassa cittassa anantaraa  aggamagga.m pa.tilabhissanti tesa.m kusalaa dhammaa uppajjittha, no ca tesa.m  akusalaa dhammaa uppajjissanti. itaresa.m tesa.m kusalaa ca dhammaa  uppajjittha akusalaa ca dhammaa uppajjissanti.
text.4690: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca purisaa ^a^T2.0443^ea^  upekkhaaya upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  somanassindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m purisindriya.m na  uppajjati.
text.4691: [03] kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare  pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca upekkhaaya upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti  tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m somanassindriya~nca na uppajjissati  purisindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.4692: [03] (ka) yassa purisindriya.m na uppajjati tassa upekkhindriya.m na  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4693: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissati.  kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m ye  ca somanassena upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m  purisindriya~nca na uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4694: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa  purisindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.4695: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca purisaa  somanassena upapajjitvaa ^a^V3.0396^ea^ parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m purisindriya.m na  uppajjati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare  pacchimabhavikaana.m ye ca ^a^M3.0268^ea^ somanassena upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti  tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjissati purisindriya~nca  na uppajjati.
text.4696: [03] yassa ^a^T2.0444^ea^ purisindriya.m na uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m...pe0...  pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... manindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4697: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m na purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m purisindriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m manindriya.m na uppajjissati. kaamaavacare  parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m  purisindriya~nca na uppajjati manindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4698: [03] yassa vaa pana manindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa purisindriya.m  na uppajjatiiti?
text.4699: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m manindriya.m na  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m purisindriya.m na uppajjati. kaamaavacare  parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m  manindriya~nca na uppajjissati purisindriya~nca na uppajjati.  (purisindriyamuulaka.m)
text.470: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana akusalaa dhammaa uppajjissanti tassa  kusalaa dhammaa uppajjitthaati? aamantaa.
text.4700: [03] 389^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  somanassindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4701: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m somanassindriya.m na  uppajjissati. pacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa  upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati tassa cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  tesa.m jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjati somanassindriya~nca na  uppajjissati.
text.4702: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V3.0397^ea^ vaa pana somanassindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.4703: [03] pacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa  upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati tassa cittassa ^a^T2.0445^ea^  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m somanassindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati. pacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne yassa  cittassa anantaraa upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati tassa  cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m somanassindriya~nca na uppajjissati  jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.4704: [03] (ka) yassa jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati tassa upekkhindriya.m  na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4705: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m upekkhindriya.m na  uppajjissati. pacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa  somanassasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati tassa cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca na  uppajjissati.
text.4706: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.4707: [03] pacchimacittassa ^a^M3.0269^ea^ uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa  somanassasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati tassa cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati. pacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne yassa  cittassa anantaraa somanassasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati tassa  cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjissati  jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.4708: [03] yassa jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati  tassa saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... ^a^T2.0446^ea^ manindriya.m na  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4709: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati ^a^V3.0398^ea^, no ca tesa.m manindriya.m na uppajjissati.  pacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjati  manindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.471: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^V3.0039^ea^ ^a^M3.0027^ea^ kusalaa dhammaa uppajjittha tassa abyaakataa dhammaa  uppajjissantiiti?
text.4710: [03] yassa vaa pana manindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa jiivitindriya.m  na uppajjatiiti?
text.4711: [03] pacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m manindriya.m na uppajjissati,  no ca tesa.m jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati. pacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  tesa.m manindriya~nca na uppajjissati jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjati.  (jiivitindriyamuulaka.m)
text.4712: [03] 390^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa somanassindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4713: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne somanassavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m somanassindriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissati.  somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacittasama"ngiina.m yassa cittassa anantaraa  somanassasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati tassa cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca na  uppajjissati.
text.4714: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa  somanassindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.4715: [03] somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa  anantaraa somanassasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati ^a^T2.0447^ea^ tassa cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m  somanassindriya.m na uppajjati. somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacittasama"ngiina.m yassa cittassa  anantaraa somanassasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati tassa cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjissati somanassindriya~nca  na uppajjati.
text.4716: [03] yassa somanassindriya.m na uppajjati tassa saddhindriya.m...pe0...  pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... manindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4717: [03] sabbesa.m ^a^V3.0399^ea^ cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne ^a^T2.0448^ea^ somanassavippayuttacittassa  ^a^M3.0270^ea^ uppaadakkha.ne nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m somanassindriya.m  na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m manindriya.m na uppajjissati.  somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacittasama"ngiina.m tesa.m somanassindriya~nca na  uppajjati manindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4718: [03] yassa vaa pana manindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa  somanassindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.4719: [03] somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m manindriya.m  na uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m somanassindriya.m na uppajjati.  somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacittasama"ngiina.m tesa.m manindriya~nca na  uppajjissati somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati.  (somanassindriyamuulaka.m)
text.472: [03] pacchimacittasama"ngiina.m tesa.m kusalaa dhammaa uppajjittha, no ca  tesa.m abyaakataa dhammaa uppajjissanti. itaresa.m tesa.m kusalaa ca  dhammaa uppajjittha abyaakataa ca dhammaa uppajjissanti.
text.4720: [03] 391^b^.^eb^ yassa upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  saddhindriya.m...pe0... ^a^T2.0449^ea^ pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... manindriya.m na  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4721: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne upekkhaavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m upekkhindriya.m na  uppajjati, no ca tesa.m manindriya.m na uppajjissati.  upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  somanassasampayuttapacchimacittasama"ngiina.m tesa.m upekkhindriya~nca na  uppajjati manindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4722: [03] yassa vaa pana manindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa upekkhindriya.m  na uppajjatiiti?
text.4723: [03] upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m manindriya.m  na uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati.  upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  somanassasampayuttapacchimacittasama"ngiina.m tesa.m manindriya~nca na  uppajjissati upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati. (upekkhindriyamuulaka.m)
text.4724: [03] 392^b^.^eb^ yassa ^a^V3.0400^ea^ saddhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... ^a^T2.0450^ea^ manindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4725: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne saddhaavippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne  nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m saddhindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca  tesa.m manindriya.m na uppajjissati. pacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  saddhindriya~nca na uppajjati manindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4726: [03] yassa vaa pana manindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa saddhindriya.m  na uppajjatiiti?
text.4727: [03] pacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m manindriya.m na uppajjissati,  no ca tesa.m saddhindriya.m na uppajjati. pacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  tesa.m manindriya~nca na uppajjissati saddhindriya~nca na uppajjati.  (saddhindriyamuulaka.m)
text.4728: [03] 393^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati tassa manindriya.m  na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4729: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne ~naa.navippayuttacittassa uppaadakkha.ne  nirodhasamaapannaana.m ^a^M3.0271^ea^ asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati, no  ca tesa.m manindriya.m na uppajjissati pacchimacittassa ^a^T2.0451^ea^ bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  pa~n~nindriya~nca na uppajjati manindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.473: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa uppajjissanti tassa  kusalaa dhammaa uppajjitthaati? aamantaa.
text.4730: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana manindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa  pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.4731: [03] pacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m manindriya.m na uppajjissati,  no ca tesa.m pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjati. pacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  tesa.m manindriya~nca na uppajjissati pa~n~nindriya~nca na uppajjati.  (pa~n~nindriyamuulaka.m)
text.4733: [03] 394^b^.^eb^ yattha ^a^V3.0401^ea^ cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tattha sotindriya.m na  uppajjissatiiti?...pe0....
text.4735: [03] 395^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  sotindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4736: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha sotindriya.m na  uppajjissati. pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati sotindriya~nca na  uppajjissati.
text.4737: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha sotindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa  tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.4738: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  sotindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na  uppajjati. pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m  tattha sotindriya~nca na uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.4739: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  ghaanindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.474: [03] 90^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa akusalaa dhammaa uppajjittha tassa abyaakataa  dhammaa uppajjissantiiti?
text.4740: [03] kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m ^a^T2.0452^ea^ upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m na  uppajjissati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacaraa cavantaana.m  asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati  ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4741: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha ghaanindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa  tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.4742: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ruupaavacara.m  upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m  tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m  ruupaavacaraa cavantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya~nca  na uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.4743: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^V3.0402^ea^ ^a^M3.0272^ea^ yattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  itthindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4744: [03] kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m na  uppajjissati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacaraa cavantaana.m  asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m ye ca purisaa eteneva bhaavena katici bhave  dassetvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya~nca  na uppajjati itthindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4745: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha itthindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa  tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.4746: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ruupaavacara.m  upapajjantaana.m ye ca purisaa eteneva bhaavena ^a^T2.0453^ea^ katici bhave dassetvaa  parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m na  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati.  kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacaraa cavantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m  aruupaana.m ye ca purisaa eteneva bhaavena katici bhave dassetvaa  parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha itthindriya~nca na  uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.4747: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  purisindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4748: [03] kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m  na uppajjissati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacaraa cavantaana.m  asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m yaa ca itthiyo eteneva bhaavena katici bhave  dassetvaa parinibbaayissanti taasa.m cavantiina.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati purisindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4749: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^V3.0403^ea^ vaa pana yattha purisindriya.m na uppajjissati  tassa tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.475: [03] pacchimacittasama"ngiina.m tesa.m akusalaa dhammaa uppajjittha ^a^T2.0070^ea^, no ca  tesa.m abyaakataa dhammaa uppajjissanti. itaresa.m tesa.m akusalaa ca  dhammaa uppajjittha abyaakataa ca dhammaa uppajjissanti.
text.4750: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ruupaavacara.m  upapajjantaana.m yaa ca itthiyo eteneva bhaavena katici bhave dassetvaa  parinibbaayissanti taasa.m upapajjantiina.m tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m na  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati.  kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacaraa cavantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m  aruupaana.m yaa ca itthiyo eteneva bhaavena katici bhave ^a^T2.0454^ea^ dassetvaa  parinibbaayissanti taasa.m cavantiina.m tesa.m tattha purisindriya~nca na  uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.4751: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4752: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya.m ^a^M3.0273^ea^ na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m na  uppajjissati. pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati jiivitindriya~nca na  uppajjissati.
text.4753: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjissati  tassa tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.4754: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na  uppajjati. pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupe pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m  tattha jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjissati cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.4755: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  somanassindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4756: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  somanassindriya.m na uppajjissati. pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m  asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m ye ^a^V3.0404^ea^ ca sacakkhukaa upekkhaaya upapajjitvaa  parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya~nca na  uppajjati somanassindriya~nca na ^a^T2.0455^ea^ uppajjissati.
text.4757: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjissati  tassa tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.4758: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m pa~ncavokaara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca sacakkhukaa  upekkhaaya upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  tattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati. pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m  aruupaana.m ye ca sacakkhukaa upekkhaaya upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti  tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha somanassindriya~nca na uppajjissati  cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.4759: [03] (ka) yassa yattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.476: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa uppajjissanti tassa  akusalaa dhammaa uppajjitthaati? aamantaa.
text.4760: [03] pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m acakkhukaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  aruupaana.m tesa.m tattha cakkhundriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissati. pa~ncavokaare parinibbantaana.m aruupe  pacchimabhavikaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m ye ca sacakkhukaa somanassena  upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha  cakkhundriya~nca na uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjissati.

text.4770: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca purisaa eteneva  bhaavena katici bhave dassetvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m  tesa.m tattha itthindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya.m  na uppajjati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacaraana.m aruupaavacaraana.m  ye ca purisaa ^a^V3.0406^ea^ eteneva bhaavena katici bhave ^a^T2.0458^ea^ dassetvaa  parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha itthindriya~nca na  uppajjissati ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjati.

text.4772: [03] kaamaavacaraa cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m kaamaavacara.m upapajjantaana.m  ^a^M3.0275^ea^ tesa.m  tattha ghaanindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha purisindriya.m na  uppajjissati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacaraana.m  aruupaavacaraana.m yaa ca itthiyo eteneva bhaavena katici bhave dassetvaa  parinibbaayissanti taasa.m cavantiina.m tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya~nca na  uppajjati purisindriya~nca na uppajjissati.

text.4776: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m aghaanakaana.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha  ghaanindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m ^a^T2.0459^ea^ na  uppajjissati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare aruupaavacare  pacchimabhavikaana.m tesa.m tattha ghaanindriya~nca na uppajjati  jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjissati.

text.4794: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m itthiina.m upapajjantiina.m yaa ca itthiyo eteneva  bhaavena katici bhave dassetvaa parinibbaayissanti taasa.m upapajjantiina.m  taasa.m tattha purisindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca taasa.m tattha  itthindriya.m na uppajjati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacaraana.m  aruupaavacaraana.m yaa ca itthiyo eteneva bhaavena katici bhave dassetvaa  parinibbaayissanti taasa.m cavantiina.m tesa.m tattha purisindriya~nca na ^a^T2.0463^ea^  uppajjissati itthindriya~nca na uppajjati.

text.4818: [03] pacchimabhavikaana.m purisaana.m upapajjantaana.m ye ca purisaa  upekkhaaya upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m  tattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha  purisindriya.m na uppajjati. kaamaavacare parinibbantaana.m ruupaavacare  pacchimabhavikaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m aruupaana.m ye ca purisaa upekkhaaya  upapajjitvaa parinibbaayissanti tesa.m cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha  somanassindriya~nca na uppajjissati purisindriya~nca na uppajjati.

text.4825: [03] yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa tattha  purisindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?

(purisindriyamuulaka.m)
text.4827: [03] 399^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V3.0414^ea^ yattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4828: [03] catuvokaaraa pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m na ^a^T2.0470^ea^ uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  somanassindriya.m na uppajjissati. pacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  yassa cittassa anantaraa upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati  tassa cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaa cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha  jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjati somanassindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4829: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjissati  tassa tattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.483: [03] suddhaavaasaana.m dutiye citte vattamaane tesa.m tattha akusalaa dhammaa  uppajjissanti, no ca tesa.m tattha kusalaa dhammaa uppajjittha. itaresa.m  catuvokaaraana.m pa~ncavokaaraana.m tesa.m tattha akusalaa ca dhammaa  uppajjissanti kusalaa ca dhammaa uppajjittha.
text.4830: [03] pacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa  upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati tassa cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasatta.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha ^a^M3.0281^ea^ somanassindriya.m na  uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati.  pacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne yassa cittassa anantaraa  upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati tassa cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  asa~n~nasattaa cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha somanassindriya~nca na uppajjissati  jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.4831: [03] (ka) yassa yattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.4832: [03] catuvokaaraa pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissati. pacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne yassa  cittassa anantaraa somanassasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati tassa  cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaa cavantaana.m tesa.m tattha  jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjati upekkhindriya~nca na ^a^T2.0471^ea^ uppajjissati.

text.4835: [03] yassa yattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m...pe0... ^a^T2.0472^ea^ pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... manindriya.m na  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4836: [03] catuvokaaraa pa~ncavokaaraa cavantaana.m pavatte cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha manindriya.m  na uppajjissati. pacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaa cavantaana.m  tesa.m tattha jiivitindriya~nca na uppajjati manindriya~nca na  uppajjissati.
text.4837: [03] yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa tattha  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?

text.4839: [03] 400^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjati tassa  tattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.484: [03] (ka) yassa yattha kusalaa dhammaa uppajjittha tassa tattha  abyaakataa dhammaa uppajjissantiiti?
text.4840: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne somanassavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne ^a^M3.0282^ea^ tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m  tattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissati.  somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacittasama"ngiina.m yassa cittassa anantaraa  somanassasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati tassa cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m ^a^V3.0416^ea^ tesa.m tattha somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati  upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4841: [03] (kha) yassa ^a^T2.0473^ea^ vaa pana yattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissati  tassa tattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.4842: [03] somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne yassa cittassa  anantaraa somanassasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati tassa cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m  tattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjati.  somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacittasama"ngiina.m yassa cittassa anantaraa  somanassasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati tassa cittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjissati  somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati.
text.4843: [03] yassa yattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... manindriya.m na  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4844: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne somanassavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m  tattha manindriya.m na uppajjissati. somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacittasama"ngiina.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  tattha somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati manindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.4845: [03] yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa tattha  somanassindriya.m na uppajjatiiti?
text.4846: [03] somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  manindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m ^a^T2.0474^ea^ na  uppajjati. somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacittasama"ngiina.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha  manindriya~nca na uppajjissati somanassindriya~nca na uppajjati. text.4847: [03] 401^b^.^eb^ yassa yattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... manindriya.m na  uppajjissatiiti?
text.4848: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne upekkhaavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjati, no ca tesa.m tattha  manindriya.m na ^a^T2.0475^ea^ uppajjissati ^a^V3.0417^ea^. upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne somanassasampayuttapacchimacittasama"ngiina.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  tattha ^a^M3.0283^ea^ upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati manindriya~nca na uppajjissati.

text.485: [03] pacchimacittasama"ngiina.m tesa.m tattha kusalaa dhammaa uppajjittha, no  ca tesa.m tattha abyaakataa dhammaa uppajjissanti. itaresa.m  catuvokaaraana.m pa~ncavokaaraana.m tesa.m tattha kusalaa ^a^T2.0071^ea^ ca dhammaa uppajjittha  abyaakataa ca dhammaa uppajjissanti.
text.4850: [03] upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacittassa uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha  manindriya.m na uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m na  uppajjati. upekkhaasampayuttapacchimacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  somanassasampayuttapacchimacittasama"ngiina.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha  manindriya~nca na uppajjissati upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjati. text.4851: [03] 402^b^.^eb^ yassa yattha saddhindriya.m na uppajjati tassa tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... ^a^T2.0476^ea^ manindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?

text.5174: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjissati  tassa tattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjitthaati? uppajjittha.
text.5175: [03] yassa yattha jiivitindriya.m na uppajjittha tassa tattha  upekkhindriya.m...pe0... saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0...  manindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti? uppajjissati.
text.5176: [03] yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa tattha  jiivitindriya.m na uppajjitthaati? uppajjittha.  (jiivitindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5177: [03] 431^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjittha tassa  tattha upekkhindriya.m ^a^T2.0518^ea^ na uppajjissatiiti?
text.5178: [03] suddhaavaasaana.m dutiye citte vattamaane tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m  na uppajjittha, no ca tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissati.  asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha somanassindriya~nca na uppajjittha  upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.5179: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjissati  tassa tattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjitthaati?
text.518: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa nirujjhanti tassa  kusalaa dhammaa nirujjhantiiti?
text.5180: [03] pacchimacittasama"ngiina.m yassa cittassa anantaraa  somanassasampayuttapacchimacitta.m uppajjissati tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m  na uppajjissati, no ca tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjittha.  asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjissati  somanassindriya~nca na uppajjittha.
text.5181: [03] yassa ^a^V3.0451^ea^ ^a^M3.0306^ea^ yattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjittha tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... manindriya.m na  uppajjissatiiti?
text.5182: [03] suddhaavaasaana.m dutiye citte vattamaane tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m  na uppajjittha, no ca tesa.m tattha manindriya.m na uppajjissati.  asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha somanassindriya~nca na uppajjittha  manindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.5183: [03] yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa tattha  somanassindriya.m na uppajjitthaati?
text.5184: [03] pacchimacittasama"ngiina.m tesa.m tattha manindriya.m na uppajjissati,  no ca tesa.m tattha somanassindriya.m na uppajjittha. asa~n~nasattaana.m  tesa.m tattha manindriya~nca na uppajjissati somanassindriya~nca na  uppajjittha. (somanassindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5185: [03] 432^b^.^eb^ yassa ^a^T2.0519^ea^ yattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjittha tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... manindriya.m na  uppajjissatiiti?
text.5186: [03] suddhaavaasa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjittha,  no ca tesa.m tattha manindriya.m na uppajjissati. asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  tattha upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjittha manindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.5187: [03] yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa tattha  upekkhindriya.m na uppajjitthaati?
text.5188: [03] pacchimacittasama"ngiina.m tesa.m tattha manindriya.m na uppajjissati,  no ca tesa.m tattha upekkhindriya.m na uppajjittha. asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  tattha manindriya~nca na uppajjissati upekkhindriya~nca na uppajjittha.  (upekkhindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5189: [03] 433^b^.^eb^ yassa ^a^T2.0520^ea^ ^a^V3.0452^ea^ yattha saddhindriya.m na uppajjittha tassa tattha  pa~n~nindriya.m...pe0... manindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.519: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte kusalavippayuttacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  abyaakataa dhammaa ^a^T2.0074^ea^ nirujjhanti, no ca tesa.m kusalaa dhammaa  nirujjhanti. pa~ncavokaare kusalaana.m bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m abyaakataa ca  dhammaa nirujjhanti kusalaa ca dhammaa nirujjhanti.
text.5190: [03] suddhaavaasa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m na uppajjittha,  no ca tesa.m tattha manindriya.m na uppajjissati. asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  tattha saddhindriya~nca na uppajjittha manindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.5191: [03] yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m na uppajjissati tassa tattha  saddhindriya.m na uppajjitthaati?
text.5192: [03] pacchimacittasama"ngiina.m tesa.m tattha manindriya.m na uppajjissati,  no ca tesa.m tattha saddhindriya.m na uppajjittha. asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  tattha manindriya~nca na uppajjissati saddhindriya~nca na uppajjittha.  (saddhindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5193: [03] 434^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjittha tassa  tattha manindriya.m na uppajjissatiiti?
text.5194: [03] suddhaavaasa.m upapajjantaana.m tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjittha,  no ca tesa.m tattha manindriya.m na uppajjissati. asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  tattha pa~n~nindriya~nca na uppajjittha manindriya~nca na uppajjissati.
text.5195: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha manindriya.m ^a^M3.0307^ea^ na uppajjissati tassa  tattha pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjitthaati?
text.5196: [03] pacchimacittasama"ngiina.m tesa.m tattha manindriya.m na uppajjissati,  no ca tesa.m tattha pa~n~nindriya.m na uppajjittha. asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m  tattha manindriya~nca na uppajjissati pa~n~nindriya~nca na uppajjittha.  (pa~n~nindriyamuulaka.m)...pe0....
text.520: [03] 100^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa akusalaa dhammaa nirujjhanti tassa  abyaakataa dhammaa nirujjhantiiti?
text.5201: [03] 435^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ^a^T2.0521^ea^ ^a^V3.0453^ea^ cakkhundriya.m parijaanaati so sotindriya.m  parijaanaatiiti? aamantaa.
text.5202: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana sotindriya.m parijaanaati so cakkhundriya.m  parijaanaatiiti? aamantaa.
text.5203: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m parijaanaati so domanassindriya.m  pajahatiiti? no.
text.5204: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana domanassindriya.m pajahati so cakkhundriya.m  parijaanaatiiti? no.
text.5205: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m parijaanaati so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavetiiti? no.
text.5206: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaaveti so  cakkhundriya.m parijaanaatiiti? no.
text.5207: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m parijaanaati so a~n~nindriya.m bhaavetiiti?  aamantaa.
text.5208: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m bhaaveti so cakkhundriya.m  parijaanaatiiti?
text.5209: [03] dve puggalaa a~n~nindriya.m bhaaventi, no ca cakkhundriya.m  parijaananti. aggamaggasama"ngii a~n~nindriya~nca bhaaveti  cakkhundriya~nca parijaanaati.
text.521: [03] aruupe akusalaana.m bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m akusalaa dhammaa  nirujjhanti, no ca tesa.m abyaakataa dhammaa nirujjhanti.  pa~ncavokaare akusalaana.m bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m akusalaa ca dhammaa  nirujjhanti abyaakataa ca dhammaa nirujjhanti.
text.5210: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m parijaanaati so a~n~naataavindriya.m  sacchikarotiiti? no.
text.5211: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikaroti so  cakkhundriya.m parijaanaatiiti? no. (cakkhundriyamuulaka.m)
text.5212: [03] 436^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo domanassindriya.m pajahati so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavetiiti? no.
text.5213: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaaveti so  domanassindriya.m pajahatiiti? no.
text.5214: [03] (ka) yo ^a^V3.0454^ea^ ^a^M3.0308^ea^ domanassindriya.m pajahati so a~n~nindriya.m bhaavetiiti?  aamantaa ^a^T2.0522^ea^.
text.5215: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m bhaaveti so domanassindriya.m  pajahatiiti?
text.5216: [03] dve puggalaa a~n~nindriya.m bhaaventi, no ca domanassindriya.m  pajahanti. anaagaamimaggasama"ngii a~n~nindriya~nca bhaaveti  domanassindriya~nca pajahati.
text.5217: [03] (ka) yo domanassindriya.m pajahati so a~n~naataavindriya.m  sacchikarotiiti? no.
text.5218: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikaroti so  domanassindriya.m pajahatiiti? no. (domanassindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5219: [03] 437^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaaveti so  a~n~nindriya.m bhaavetiiti? no.
text.522: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa nirujjhanti tassa  akusalaa dhammaa nirujjhantiiti?
text.5220: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m bhaaveti so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavetiiti? no.
text.5221: [03] (ka) yo ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaaveti so  a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarotiiti? no.
text.5222: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikaroti so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavetiiti? no.  (ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5223: [03] 438^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo a~n~nindriya.m bhaaveti so a~n~naataavindriya.m  sacchikarotiiti? no.
text.5224: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikaroti so  a~n~nindriya.m bhaavetiiti? no. (a~n~nindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5226: [03] 439^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaati so  domanassindriya.m nappajahatiiti?
text.5227: [03] anaagaamimaggasama"ngii cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaati, no ca  domanassindriya.m ^a^V3.0455^ea^ nappajahati. dve maggasama"ngino .thapetvaa avasesaa  puggalaa cakkhundriya~nca na parijaananti domanassindriya~nca  nappajahanti.
text.5228: [03] (kha) yo ^a^T2.0523^ea^ vaa pana domanassindriya.m nappajahati so cakkhundriya.m  na parijaanaatiiti?
text.5229: [03] aggamaggasama"ngii domanassindriya.m nappajahati, no ca  cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaati. dve maggasama"ngino .thapetvaa avasesaa  puggalaa domanassindriya~nca nappajahanti cakkhundriya~nca na  parijaananti.
text.523: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte akusalavippayuttacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  tesa.m abyaakataa dhammaa nirujjhanti, no ca tesa.m akusalaa dhammaa  nirujjhanti. pa~ncavokaare akusalaana.m bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m abyaakataa ca  dhammaa nirujjhanti akusalaa ca dhammaa nirujjhanti.
text.5230: [03] (ka) yo ^a^M3.0309^ea^ cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaati so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavetiiti?
text.5231: [03] a.t.thamako cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaati, no ca  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaaveti. dve maggasama"ngino .thapetvaa  avasesaa puggalaa cakkhundriya~nca na parijaananti  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaaventi.
text.5232: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaaveti so  cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaatiiti?
text.5233: [03] aggamaggasama"ngii ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaaveti, no ca  cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaati. dve maggasama"ngino .thapetvaa avasesaa  puggalaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaaventi cakkhundriya~nca na  parijaananti.
text.5234: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaati so a~n~nindriya.m na  bhaavetiiti?
text.5235: [03] dve puggalaa cakkhundriya.m na parijaananti, no ca a~n~nindriya.m na  bhaaventi. tayo maggasama"ngino .thapetvaa avasesaa puggalaa  cakkhundriya~nca na parijaananti a~n~nindriya~nca na bhaaventi.
text.5236: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m na bhaaveti so cakkhundriya.m na  parijaanaatiiti? aamantaa.
text.5237: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaati so a~n~naataavindriya.m na  sacchikarotiiti?
text.5238: [03] yo ^a^V3.0456^ea^ aggaphala.m sacchikaroti so cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaati,  no ca a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikaroti. aggamaggasama"ngi~nca  arahanta~nca .thapetvaa avasesaa puggalaa cakkhundriya~nca na parijaananti  a~n~naataavindriya~nca ^a^T2.0524^ea^ na sacchikaronti.
text.5239: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikaroti so  cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaatiiti?
text.5240: [03] aggamaggasama"ngii a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikaroti, no ca  cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaati. aggamaggasama"ngi~nca arahanta~nca .thapetvaa  avasesaa puggalaa a~n~naataavindriya~nca na sacchikaronti cakkhundriya~nca  na parijaananti. (cakkhundriyamuulaka.m)
text.5241: [03] 440^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo domanassindriya.m nappajahati so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavetiiti?
text.5242: [03] a.t.thamako domanassindriya.m nappajahati, no ca  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaaveti. dve maggasama"ngino .thapetvaa  avasesaa puggalaa domanassindriya~nca nappajahanti  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaaventi.
text.5243: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaaveti so  domanassindriya.m nappajahatiiti?
text.5244: [03] anaagaamimaggasama"ngii ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaaveti,  no ca domanassindriya.m nappajahati. dve maggasama"ngino .thapetvaa  avasesaa ^a^M3.0310^ea^ puggalaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaaventi  domanassindriya~nca nappajahanti.
text.5245: [03] (ka) yo domanassindriya.m nappajahati so a~n~nindriya.m na  bhaavetiiti?
text.5246: [03] dve puggalaa domanassindriya.m nappajahanti, no ca a~n~nindriya.m  na bhaaventi. tayo maggasama"ngino .thapetvaa avasesaa puggalaa  domanassindriya~nca nappajahanti a~n~nindriya~nca na bhaaventi.
text.5247: [03] (kha) yo ^a^V3.0457^ea^ vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m na bhaaveti so domanassindriya.m  nappajahatiiti? aamantaa.
text.5248: [03] (ka) yo ^a^T2.0525^ea^ domanassindriya.m nappajahati so a~n~naataavindriya.m na  sacchikarotiiti?
text.5249: [03] yo aggaphala.m sacchikaroti so domanassindriya.m nappajahati,  no ca a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikaroti. anaagaamimaggasama"ngi~nca  arahanta~nca .thapetvaa avasesaa puggalaa domanassindriya~nca nappajahanti  a~n~naataavindriya~nca na sacchikaronti.
text.525: [03] 101^b^.^eb^ (ka) yattha ^a^V3.0044^ea^ kusalaa dhammaa nirujjhanti tattha akusalaa  dhammaa nirujjhantiiti? aamantaa.
text.5250: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikaroti so  domanassindriya.m nappajahatiiti?
text.5251: [03] anaagaamimaggasama"ngii a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikaroti, no  ca domanassindriya.m nappajahati. anaagaamimaggasama"ngi~nca arahanta~nca  .thapetvaa avasesaa puggalaa a~n~naataavindriya~nca na sacchikaronti  domanassindriya~nca nappajahanti. (domanassindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5252: [03] 441^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaaveti so  a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavetiiti?
text.5253: [03] tayo maggasama"ngino {tayo puggalaa (pii0)} ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaaventi,  no ca a~n~nindriya.m na bhaaventi. cattaaro maggasama"ngino {a.t.thamaka~nca tayo   maggasama"ngino ca (pii0)} .thapetvaa  avasesaa puggalaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaaventi  a~n~nindriya~nca na bhaaventi.
text.5254: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m na bhaaveti so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavetiiti?
text.5255: [03] a.t.thamako a~n~nindriya.m na bhaaveti, no ca  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaaveti. cattaaro maggasama"ngino  .thapetvaa avasesaa puggalaa a~n~nindriya~nca na bhaaventi  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaaventi.
text.5256: [03] (ka) yo ^a^V3.0458^ea^ ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaaveti so  a~n~naataavindriya.m ^a^T2.0526^ea^ na sacchikarotiiti?
text.5257: [03] yo aggaphala.m sacchikaroti so ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na  bhaaveti, no ca a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikaroti. a.t.thamaka~nca  ^a^M3.0311^ea^ arahanta~nca .thapetvaa avasesaa puggalaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na  bhaaventi a~n~naataavindriya~nca na sacchikaronti.
text.5258: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikaroti so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavetiiti?
text.5259: [03] a.t.thamako a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikaroti, no ca  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaaveti. a.t.thamaka~nca arahanta~nca  .thapetvaa avasesaa puggalaa a~n~naataavindriya~nca na sacchikaronti  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaaventi.  (ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriyamuulaka.m)
text.526: [03] (kha) yattha vaa pana akusalaa dhammaa nirujjhanti tattha kusalaa  dhammaa nirujjhantiiti? aamantaa.
text.5260: [03] 442^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo a~n~nindriya.m na bhaaveti so a~n~naataavindriya.m  na sacchikarotiiti?
text.5261: [03] yo aggaphala.m sacchikaroti so a~n~nindriya.m na bhaaveti, no  ca a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikaroti. tayo maggasama"ngino ca  arahanta~nca .thapetvaa avasesaa puggalaa a~n~nindriya~nca na bhaaventi  a~n~naataavindriya~nca na sacchikaronti.
text.5262: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikaroti so  a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavetiiti?
text.5263: [03] tayo maggasama"ngino a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikaronti, no  ca a~n~nindriya.m na bhaaventi. tayo maggasama"ngino ca arahanta~nca  .thapetvaa avasesaa puggalaa a~n~naataavindriya~nca na sacchikaronti  a~n~nindriya~nca na bhaaventi. (a~n~nindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5266: [03] 443^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ^a^V3.0459^ea^ cakkhundriya.m parijaanittha so  domanassindriya.m pajahitthaati ^a^T2.0527^ea^? aamantaa.
text.5267: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana domanassindriya.m pajahittha so cakkhundriya.m  parijaanitthaati?
text.5268: [03] dve puggalaa domanassindriya.m pajahittha, no ca cakkhundriya.m  parijaanittha. arahaa domanassindriya~nca pajahittha cakkhundriya~nca  parijaanittha.
text.5269: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m parijaanittha so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavitthaati? aamantaa.
text.527: [03] (ka) yattha kusalaa dhammaa nirujjhanti tattha abyaakataa dhammaa  nirujjhantiiti? aamantaa.
text.5270: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavittha so  cakkhundriya.m parijaanitthaati?
text.5271: [03] cha puggalaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavittha, no ca  cakkhundriya.m parijaanittha. arahaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca  bhaavittha cakkhundriya~nca parijaanittha.
text.5272: [03] (ka) yo ^a^M3.0312^ea^ cakkhundriya.m parijaanittha so a~n~nindriya.m  bhaavitthaati? aamantaa.
text.5273: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m bhaavittha so cakkhundriya.m  parijaanitthaati? aamantaa.
text.5274: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m parijaanittha so a~n~naataavindriya.m  sacchikaritthaati?
text.5275: [03] yo aggaphala.m sacchikaroti so cakkhundriya.m parijaanittha, no  ca a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarittha. yo aggaphala.m sacchaakaasi so  cakkhundriya~nca parijaanittha a~n~naataavindriya~nca sacchikarittha.
text.5276: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarittha so  cakkhundriya.m parijaanitthaati? aamantaa. (cakkhundriyamuulaka.m)
text.5277: [03] 444^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ^a^V3.0460^ea^ domanassindriya.m pajahittha so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m ^a^T2.0528^ea^ bhaavitthaati? aamantaa.
text.5278: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavittha so  domanassindriya.m pajahitthaati?
text.5279: [03] cattaaro puggalaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavittha, no ca  domanassindriya.m pajahittha. tayo puggalaa  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca bhaavittha domanassindriya~nca pajahittha.
text.528: [03] (kha) yattha vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa nirujjhanti tattha  kusalaa dhammaa nirujjhantiiti?
text.5280: [03] (ka) yo domanassindriya.m pajahittha so a~n~nindriya.m  bhaavitthaati?
text.5281: [03] dve puggalaa domanassindriya.m pajahittha, no ca a~n~nindriya.m  bhaavittha. arahaa domanassindriya~nca pajahittha a~n~nindriya~nca  bhaavittha.
text.5282: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m bhaavittha so domanassindriya.m  pajahitthaati? aamantaa.
text.5283: [03] (ka) yo domanassindriya.m pajahittha so a~n~naataavindriya.m  sacchikaritthaati?
text.5284: [03] tayo puggalaa domanassindriya.m pajahittha, no ca  a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarittha. arahaa domanassindriya~nca pajahittha  a~n~naataavindriya~nca sacchikarittha.
text.5285: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarittha so  domanassindriya.m pajahitthaati? aamantaa. (domanassindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5286: [03] 445^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavittha so  a~n~nindriya.m bhaavitthaati?
text.5287: [03] cha puggalaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavittha, no ca  a~n~nindriya.m bhaavittha. arahaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca bhaavittha  a~n~nindriya~nca bhaavittha.
text.5288: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m bhaavittha so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavitthaati? aamantaa.
text.5289: [03] (ka) yo ^a^T2.0529^ea^ ^a^M3.0313^ea^ ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavittha so  a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikaritthaati?
text.529: [03] asa~n~nasatte tattha abyaakataa dhammaa nirujjhanti, no ca tattha  kusalaa dhammaa nirujjhanti. catuvokaare pa~ncavokaare ^a^T2.0075^ea^ tattha abyaakataa  ca dhammaa nirujjhanti kusalaa ca dhammaa nirujjhanti.
text.5290: [03] satta ^a^V3.0461^ea^ puggalaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavittha, no ca  a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarittha. arahaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca  bhaavittha a~n~naataavindriya~nca sacchikarittha.
text.5291: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarittha so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavitthaati? aamantaa.  (ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5292: [03] 446^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo a~n~nindriya.m bhaavittha so a~n~naataavindriya.m  sacchikaritthaati?
text.5293: [03] yo aggaphala.m sacchikaroti so a~n~nindriya.m bhaavittha, no ca  a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarittha. yo aggaphala.m sacchaakaasi so  a~n~nindriya~nca bhaavittha a~n~naataavindriya~nca sacchikarittha.
text.5294: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarittha so  a~n~nindriya.m bhaavitthaati? aamantaa. (a~n~nindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5296: [03] 447^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m na parijaanittha so  domanassindriya.m nappajahitthaati?
text.5297: [03] dve puggalaa cakkhundriya.m na parijaanittha, no ca  domanassindriya.m nappajahittha. cha puggalaa cakkhundriya~nca na  parijaanittha domanassindriya~nca nappajahittha.
text.5298: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana domanassindriya.m nappajahittha so  cakkhundriya.m na parijaanitthaati? aamantaa.
text.5299: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m na parijaanittha so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavitthaati?
text.530: [03] 102^b^.^eb^ (ka) yattha akusalaa dhammaa nirujjhanti tattha  abyaakataa dhammaa nirujjhantiiti? aamantaa.
text.5300: [03] cha puggalaa cakkhundriya.m na parijaanittha, no ca  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavittha. dve puggalaa cakkhundriya~nca ^a^T2.0530^ea^  na parijaanittha ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaavittha.
text.5301: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavittha so  cakkhundriya.m na parijaanitthaati? aamantaa.
text.5302: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m na parijaanittha so a~n~nindriya.m na  bhaavitthaati? aamantaa.
text.5303: [03] (kha) yo ^a^V3.0462^ea^ vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavittha so cakkhundriya.m na  parijaanitthaati? aamantaa.
text.5304: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m na parijaanittha so a~n~naataavindriya.m na  sacchikaritthaati? aamantaa.
text.5305: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarittha so  cakkhundriya.m na parijaanitthaati?
text.5306: [03] yo aggaphala.m sacchikaroti so a~n~naataavindriya.m na  ^a^M3.0314^ea^ sacchikarittha, no ca cakkhundriya.m na parijaanittha. a.t.tha puggalaa  a~n~naataavindriya~nca na sacchikarittha cakkhundriya~nca na parijaanittha.  (cakkhundriyamuulaka.m)
text.5307: [03] 448^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo domanassindriya.m nappajahittha so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavitthaati?
text.5308: [03] cattaaro puggalaa domanassindriya.m nappajahittha, no ca  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavittha. dve puggalaa  domanassindriya~nca nappajahittha ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na  bhaavittha.
text.5309: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavittha so  domanassindriya.m nappajahitthaati? aamantaa.
text.531: [03] (kha) yattha vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa nirujjhanti tattha  akusalaa dhammaa nirujjhantiiti?
text.5310: [03] (ka) yo domanassindriya.m nappajahittha so a~n~nindriya.m na  bhaavitthaati? aamantaa.
text.5311: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavittha so ^a^T2.0531^ea^  domanassindriya.m nappajahitthaati?
text.5312: [03] dve puggalaa a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavittha, no ca domanassindriya.m  nappajahittha. cha puggalaa a~n~nindriya~nca na bhaavittha  domanassindriya~nca nappajahittha.
text.5313: [03] (ka) yo domanassindriya.m nappajahittha so a~n~naataavindriya.m na  sacchikaritthaati? aamantaa.
text.5314: [03] (kha) yo ^a^V3.0463^ea^ vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarittha so  domanassindriya.m nappajahitthaati?
text.5315: [03] tayo puggalaa a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarittha, no ca  domanassindriya.m nappajahittha. cha puggalaa a~n~naataavindriya~nca na  sacchikarittha domanassindriya~nca nappajahittha.  (domanassindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5316: [03] 449^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavittha so  a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavitthaati? aamantaa.
text.5317: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavittha so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavitthaati?
text.5318: [03] cha puggalaa a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavittha, no ca  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavittha. dve puggalaa a~n~nindriya~nca  na bhaavittha ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaavittha.
text.5319: [03] (ka) yo ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavittha so  a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikaritthaati? aamantaa.
text.532: [03] asa~n~nasatte tattha abyaakataa dhammaa nirujjhanti, no ^a^M3.0031^ea^ ca tattha  akusalaa dhammaa nirujjhanti. catuvokaare pa~ncavokaare tattha  abyaakataa ca dhammaa nirujjhanti akusalaa ca dhammaa nirujjhanti.
text.5320: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarittha so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavitthaati?
text.5321: [03] satta puggalaa a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarittha, no ca  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavittha. dve puggalaa  a~n~naataavindriya~nca ^a^T2.0532^ea^ na sacchikarittha ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na  bhaavittha. (ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5322: [03] 450^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ^a^M3.0315^ea^ a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavittha so  a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikaritthaati? aamantaa.
text.5323: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarittha so  a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavitthaati?
text.5324: [03] yo aggaphala.m sacchikaroti so a~n~naataavindriya.m na  sacchikarittha, no ^a^V3.0464^ea^ ca a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavittha. a.t.tha puggalaa  a~n~naataavindriya~nca na sacchikarittha a~n~nindriya~nca na bhaavittha.  (a~n~nindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5327: [03] 451^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m parijaanissati so  domanassindriya.m pajahissatiiti?
text.5328: [03] dve puggalaa cakkhundriya.m parijaanissanti, no ca  domanassindriya.m pajahissanti. pa~nca puggalaa cakkhundriya~nca  parijaanissanti domanassindriya~nca pajahissanti.
text.5329: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana domanassindriya.m pajahissati so  cakkhundriya.m parijaanissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.5330: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m parijaanissati so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavessatiiti?
text.5331: [03] cha puggalaa cakkhundriya.m parijaanissanti, no ca  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavessanti. ye puthujjanaa magga.m  pa.tilabhissanti te cakkhundriya~nca parijaanissanti  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca bhaavessanti.
text.5332: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavessati so  cakkhundriya.m parijaanissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.5333: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m parijaanissati so a~n~nindriya.m  bhaavessatiiti ^a^T2.0533^ea^? aamantaa.
text.5334: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m bhaavessati so cakkhundriya.m  parijaanissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.5335: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m parijaanissati so a~n~naataavindriya.m  sacchikarissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.5336: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissati so  cakkhundriya.m parijaanissatiiti?
text.5337: [03] aggamaggasama"ngii a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissati, no ca  cakkhundriya.m ^a^V3.0465^ea^ parijaanissati. satta puggalaa a~n~naataavindriya~nca  sacchikarissanti cakkhundriya~nca parijaanissanti.  (cakkhundriyamuulaka.m)
text.5338: [03] 452^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo domanassindriya.m pajahissati so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavessatiiti?
text.5339: [03] cattaaro puggalaa domanassindriya.m pajahissanti, no  ^a^M3.0316^ea^ ca ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavessanti. ye puthujjanaa magga.m  pa.tilabhissanti te domanassindriya~nca pajahissanti  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca bhaavessanti.
text.534: [03] 103^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha kusalaa dhammaa nirujjhanti tassa  tattha akusalaa dhammaa nirujjhantiiti? no.
text.5340: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavessati so  domanassindriya.m pajahissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.5341: [03] (ka) yo domanassindriya.m pajahissati so a~n~nindriya.m  bhaavessatiiti? aamantaa.
text.5342: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m bhaavessati so domanassindriya.m  pajahissatiiti?
text.5343: [03] dve puggalaa a~n~nindriya.m bhaavessanti no ca domanassindriya.m pajahissanti,  pa~nca puggalaa a~n~nindriya~nca bhavissanti domanassindriya~nca  pajahissanti.
text.5344: [03] (ka) yo ^a^T2.0534^ea^ domanassindriya.m pajahissati so a~n~naataavindriya.m  sacchikarissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.5345: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissati so  domanassindriya.m pajahissatiiti?
text.5346: [03] tayo puggalaa a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissanti, no ca  domanassindriya.m pajahissanti. pa~nca puggalaa a~n~naataavindriya~nca  sacchikarissanti domanassindriya~nca pajahissanti.  (domanassindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5347: [03] 453^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ^a^V3.0466^ea^ ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavessati so  a~n~nindriya.m bhaavessatiiti? aamantaa.
text.5348: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m bhaavessati so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavessatiiti?
text.5349: [03] cha puggalaa a~n~nindriya.m bhaavessanti, no ca  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavessanti. ye puthujjanaa magga.m  pa.tilabhissanti te a~n~nindriya~nca bhaavessanti  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca bhaavessanti.
text.535: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha akusalaa dhammaa nirujjhanti tassa  tattha kusalaa dhammaa nirujjhantiiti? no.
text.5350: [03] (ka) yo ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavessati so  a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.5351: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissati so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavessatiiti?
text.5352: [03] satta puggalaa a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissanti, no ca  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavessanti. ye puthujjanaa magga.m  pa.tilabhissanti te a~n~naataavindriya~nca sacchikarissanti  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca bhaavessanti.  (ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5353: [03] 454^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo a~n~nindriya.m bhaavessati so a~n~naataavindriya.m  sacchikarissatiiti ^a^T2.0535^ea^? aamantaa.
text.5354: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissati so  ^a^M3.0317^ea^ a~n~nindriya.m bhaavessatiiti?
text.5355: [03] aggamaggasama"ngii a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissanti, no ca  a~n~nindriya.m bhaavessanti. satta puggalaa a~n~naataavindriya~nca  sacchikarissanti a~n~nindriya~nca bhaavessanti. (a~n~nindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5357: [03] 455^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m na parijaanissati so  domanassindriya.m nappajahissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.5358: [03] (kha) yo ^a^V3.0467^ea^ vaa pana domanassindriya.m nappajahissati so  cakkhundriya.m na parijaanissatiiti?
text.5359: [03] dve puggalaa domanassindriya.m nappajahissanti, no ca  cakkhundriya.m na parijaanissanti. tayo puggalaa domanassindriya~nca  nappajahissanti cakkhundriya~nca na parijaanissanti.
text.536: [03] (ka) yassa ^a^V3.0045^ea^ yattha kusalaa dhammaa nirujjhanti tassa tattha  abyaakataa dhammaa nirujjhantiiti?
text.5360: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m na parijaanissati so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessatiiti. aamantaa.
text.5361: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessati  so cakkhundriya.m na parijaanissatiiti.
text.5362: [03] cha puggalaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessanti, no ca  cakkhundriya.m na parijaanissanti. tayo puggalaa  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaavessanti cakkhundriya~nca na  parijaanissanti.
text.5363: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m na parijaanissati so a~n~nindriya.m na  bhaavessatiiti? aamantaa.
text.5364: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavessati so cakkhundriya.m  na parijaanissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.5365: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m na parijaanissati so a~n~naataavindriya.m  na ^a^T2.0536^ea^ sacchikarissatiiti?
text.5366: [03] aggamaggasama"ngii cakkhundriya.m na parijaanissati, no ca  a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissati. dve puggalaa cakkhundriya~nca na  parijaanissanti a~n~naataavindriya~nca na sacchikarissanti.
text.5367: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissati so  cakkhundriya.m na parijaanissatiiti? aamantaa. (cakkhundriyamuulaka.m)
text.5368: [03] 456^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo domanassindriya.m nappajahissati so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessatiiti? aamantaa.
text.5369: [03] (kha) yo ^a^V3.0468^ea^ vaa pana ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessati  so domanassindriya.m nappajahissatiiti?
text.537: [03] aruupe kusalaana.m bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha kusalaa dhammaa  nirujjhanti, no ca tesa.m tattha abyaakataa dhammaa nirujjhanti.  pa~ncavokaare kusalaana.m bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha kusalaa ca dhammaa  nirujjhanti abyaakataa ca dhammaa nirujjhanti.
text.5370: [03] cattaaro puggalaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessanti, no  ca domanassindriya.m nappajahissanti ^a^M3.0318^ea^. pa~nca puggalaa  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaavessanti domanassindriya~nca  nappajahissanti.
text.5371: [03] (ka) yo domanassindriya.m nappajahissati so a~n~nindriya.m na  bhaavessatiiti?
