text.5469: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m bhaavessati so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavetiiti?
text.547: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana akusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti tassa  kusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhantiiti?
text.5470: [03] cha puggalaa a~n~nindriya.m bhaavessanti, no ca  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaaventi. a.t.thamako a~n~nindriya~nca  bhaavessati ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca bhaaveti.
text.5471: [03] (ka) yo ^a^M3.0324^ea^ ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaaveti so  a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.5472: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissati so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavetiiti?
text.5473: [03] satta puggalaa a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissanti, no ca  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaaventi. a.t.thamako a~n~naataavindriya~nca  sacchikarissati ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca bhaaveti.  (ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5474: [03] 470^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo a~n~nindriya.m bhaaveti so a~n~naataavindriya.m  sacchikarissatiiti? aamantaa.
text.5475: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissati so  a~n~nindriya.m bhaavetiiti?
text.5476: [03] pa~nca puggalaa a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissanti, no ca  a~n~nindriya.m ^a^V3.0477^ea^ bhaaventi. tayo maggasama"ngino a~n~naataavindriya~nca  sacchikarissanti a~n~nindriya~nca bhaaventi. (a~n~nindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5478: [03] 471^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ^a^T2.0546^ea^ cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaati so  domanassindriya.m nappajahissatiiti?
text.5479: [03] pa~nca puggalaa cakkhundriya.m na parijaananti, no ca  domanassindriya.m nappajahissanti. cattaaro puggalaa cakkhundriya~nca na  parijaananti domanassindriya~nca nappajahissanti.
text.548: [03] kusalaana.m ^a^T2.0077^ea^ bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m akusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti, no  ca tesa.m kusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti. sabbesa.m cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne akusalavippayuttakusalavippayuttacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  nirodhasamaapannaana.m asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m akusalaa ca dhammaa na  nirujjhanti kusalaa ca dhammaa na nirujjhanti.
text.5480: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana domanassindriya.m nappajahissati so  cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaatiiti?
text.5481: [03] aggamaggasama"ngii domanassindriya.m nappajahissati, no ca  cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaati. cattaaro puggalaa domanassindriya~nca  nappajahissanti cakkhundriya~nca na parijaananti.
text.5482: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaati so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessatiiti?
text.5483: [03] ye puthujjanaa magga.m pa.tilabhissanti te cakkhundriya.m na  parijaananti, no ca ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessanti.  a.t.tha puggalaa cakkhundriya~nca na parijaananti  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaavessanti.
text.5484: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessati  so cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaatiiti?
text.5485: [03] aggamaggasama"ngii ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessati, no  ca cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaati. a.t.tha puggalaa  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaavessanti cakkhundriya~nca na  parijaananti.
text.5486: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaati so a~n~nindriya.m na  bhaavessatiiti?
text.5487: [03] satta puggalaa cakkhundriya.m na parijaananti, no ca a~n~nindriya.m  na bhaavessanti ^a^V3.0478^ea^. dve puggalaa cakkhundriya~nca na parijaananti   ^a^T2.0547^ea^ a~n~nindriya~nca na bhaavessanti.
text.5488: [03] (kha) yo ^a^M3.0325^ea^ vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavessati so cakkhundriya.m  na parijaanaatiiti?
text.5489: [03] aggamaggasama"ngii a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavessati, no ca  cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaati. dve puggalaa a~n~nindriya~nca na  bhaavessanti cakkhundriya~nca na parijaananti.
text.549: [03] (ka) yassa kusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti tassa abyaakataa  dhammaa na nirujjhantiiti?
text.5490: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaati so a~n~naataavindriya.m na  sacchikarissatiiti?
text.5491: [03] satta puggalaa cakkhundriya.m na parijaananti, no ca  a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissanti. dve puggalaa cakkhundriya~nca  na parijaananti a~n~naataavindriya~nca na sacchikarissanti.
text.5492: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissati so  cakkhundriya.m na parijaanaatiiti? aamantaa. (cakkhundriyamuulaka.m)
text.5493: [03] 472^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo domanassindriya.m nappajahati so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessatiiti?
text.5494: [03] ye puthujjanaa magga.m pa.tilabhissanti te domanassindriya.m  nappajahanti, no ca ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessanti. a.t.tha  puggalaa domanassindriya~nca nappajahanti ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca  na bhaavessanti.
text.5495: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessati  so domanassindriya.m nappajahatiiti?
text.5496: [03] anaagaamimaggasama"ngii ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na  bhaavessati, no ca domanassindriya.m nappajahati. a.t.tha puggalaa  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaavessanti domanassindriya~nca  nappajahanti.
text.5497: [03] (ka) yo ^a^V3.0479^ea^ domanassindriya.m nappajahati so a~n~nindriya.m na   ^a^T2.0548^ea^ bhaavessatiiti?
text.5498: [03] cha puggalaa domanassindriya.m nappajahanti, no ca a~n~nindriya.m  na bhaavessanti. tayo puggalaa domanassindriya~nca nappajahanti  a~n~nindriya~nca na bhaavessanti.
text.5499: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavessati so  domanassindriya.m nappajahatiiti? aamantaa.
text.550: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte kusalavippayuttacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  kusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti, no ca tesa.m abyaakataa dhammaa na  nirujjhanti. sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne  aruupe akusalaana.m bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m kusalaa ca dhammaa na nirujjhanti  abyaakataa ca dhammaa na nirujjhanti.
text.5500: [03] (ka) yo domanassindriya.m nappajahati so a~n~naataavindriya.m na  sacchikarissatiiti?
text.5501: [03] satta puggalaa domanassindriya.m nappajahanti, no ca  a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissanti. dve puggalaa  domanassindriya~nca nappajahanti a~n~naataavindriya~nca na  sacchikarissanti.
text.5502: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissati so  domanassindriya.m nappajahatiiti? aamantaa. (domanassindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5503: [03] 473^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaaveti so  a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavessatiiti?
text.5504: [03] cha puggalaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaaventi, no  ca a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavessanti. tayo puggalaa  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaaventi a~n~nindriya~nca na  bhaavessanti.
text.5505: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m ^a^M3.0326^ea^ na bhaavessati so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavetiiti? aamantaa.
text.5506: [03] (ka) yo ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaaveti so  a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissatiiti?
text.5507: [03] satta puggalaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaaventi, no ca  a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissanti. dve puggalaa  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaaventi a~n~naataavindriya~nca ^a^T2.0549^ea^ na  sacchikarissanti.
text.5508: [03] (kha) yo ^a^V3.0480^ea^ vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissati so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavetiiti? aamantaa.  (ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5509: [03] 474^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo a~n~nindriya.m na bhaaveti so a~n~naataavindriya.m  na sacchikarissatiiti?
text.551: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa na nirujjhanti tassa  kusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhantiiti?
text.5510: [03] pa~nca puggalaa a~n~nindriya.m na bhaaventi, no ca a~n~naataavindriya.m  na sacchikarissanti. dve puggalaa a~n~nindriya~nca na bhaaventi  a~n~naataavindriya~nca na sacchikarissanti.
text.5511: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissati so  a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavetiiti? aamantaa. (a~n~nindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5514: [03] 475^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m parijaanittha so  domanassindriya.m pajahissatiiti? no.
text.5515: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana domanassindriya.m pajahissati so  cakkhundriya.m parijaanitthaati? no.
text.5516: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m parijaanittha so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavessatiiti? no.
text.5517: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavessati so  cakkhundriya.m parijaanitthaati? no.
text.5518: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m parijaanittha so a~n~nindriya.m  bhaavessatiiti? no.
text.5519: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m bhaavessati so cakkhundriya.m  parijaanitthaati? no.
text.552: [03] aruupe kusalaana.m bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m abyaakataa dhammaa na  nirujjhanti, no ca tesa.m kusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti. sabbesa.m  upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne aruupe akusalaana.m  bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m abyaakataa ca dhammaa na nirujjhanti kusalaa ca  dhammaa na nirujjhanti.
text.5520: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m parijaanittha so a~n~naataavindriya.m  sacchikarissatiiti? no.
text.5521: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissati so ^a^T2.0550^ea^  cakkhundriya.m parijaanitthaati? no. (cakkhundriyamuulaka.m)
text.5522: [03] 476^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ^a^V3.0481^ea^ domanassindriya.m pajahittha so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavessatiiti? no.
text.5523: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavessati so  domanassindriya.m pajahitthaati? no.
text.5524: [03] (ka) yo ^a^M3.0327^ea^ domanassindriya.m pajahittha so a~n~nindriya.m  bhaavessatiiti?
text.5525: [03] dve puggalaa domanassindriya.m pajahittha, no ca a~n~nindriya.m  bhaavessanti. anaagaamii domanassindriya~nca pajahittha a~n~nindriya~nca  bhaavessati.
text.5526: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m bhaavessati so domanassindriya.m  pajahitthaati?
text.5527: [03] cha puggalaa a~n~nindriya.m bhaavessanti, no ca  domanassindriya.m pajahittha. anaagaamii a~n~nindriya~nca bhaavessati  domanassindriya~nca pajahittha.
text.5528: [03] (ka) yo domanassindriya.m pajahittha so a~n~naataavindriya.m  sacchikarissatiiti?
text.5529: [03] arahaa domanassindriya.m pajahittha, no ca a~n~naataavindriya.m  sacchikarissati. dve puggalaa domanassindriya~nca pajahittha  a~n~naataavindriya~nca sacchikarissanti.
text.553: [03] 106^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa akusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti tassa  abyaakataa dhammaa na nirujjhantiiti?
text.5530: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissati so  domanassindriya.m pajahitthaati?
text.5531: [03] cha puggalaa a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissanti, no ca  domanassindriya.m pajahittha. dve puggalaa a~n~naataavindriya~nca  sacchikarissanti domanassindriya~nca pajahittha.  (domanassindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5532: [03] 477^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavittha so  a~n~nindriya.m ^a^T2.0551^ea^ bhaavessatiiti?
text.5533: [03] dve puggalaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavittha, no ca  a~n~nindriya.m bhaavessanti. pa~nca puggalaa  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca bhaavittha a~n~nindriya~nca bhaavessanti.
text.5534: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m bhaavessati. so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavitthaati?
text.5535: [03] dve ^a^V3.0482^ea^ puggalaa a~n~nindriya.m bhaavessanti no ca  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavittha. tayo puggalaa a~n~nindriya~nca  bhaavessanti ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca bhaavittha.
text.5536: [03] (ka) yo ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavittha so  a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissatiiti?
text.5537: [03] arahaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavittha, no ca  a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissati. cha puggalaa  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca bhaavittha a~n~naataavindriya~nca  sacchikarissanti.
text.5538: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissati so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavitthaati?
text.5539: [03] dve puggalaa a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissanti, no ca  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m bhaavittha. cha puggalaa a~n~naataavindriya~nca  sacchikarissanti ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca bhaavittha.  (ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriyamuulaka.m)
text.554: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte akusalavippayuttacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  tesa.m akusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti, no ca tesa.m abyaakataa dhammaa  na nirujjhanti ^a^V3.0047^ea^. sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa  ^a^T2.0078^ea^ uppaadakkha.ne  aruupe kusalaana.m bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m akusalaa ca dhammaa na nirujjhanti  abyaakataa ca dhammaa na nirujjhanti.
text.5540: [03] 478^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo a~n~nindriya.m bhaavittha so a~n~naataavindriya.m  sacchikarissatiiti? no.
text.5541: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m sacchikarissati so  a~n~nindriya.m bhaavitthaati? no. (a~n~nindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5543: [03] 479^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ^a^M3.0328^ea^ cakkhundriya.m na parijaanittha so  domanassindriya.m nappajahissatiiti ^a^T2.0552^ea^?
text.5544: [03] pa~nca puggalaa cakkhundriya.m na parijaanittha, no ca  domanassindriya.m nappajahissanti. cattaaro puggalaa cakkhundriya~nca na  parijaanittha domanassindriya~nca nappajahissanti.
text.5545: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana domanassindriya.m nappajahissati so  cakkhundriya.m na parijaanitthaati?
text.5546: [03] arahaa ^a^V3.0483^ea^ domanassindriya.m nappajahissati, no ca cakkhundriya.m na  parijaanittha. cattaaro puggalaa domanassindriya~nca nappajahissanti  cakkhundriya~nca na parijaanittha.
text.5547: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m na parijaanittha so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessatiiti?
text.5548: [03] ye puthujjanaa magga.m pa.tilabhissanti te cakkhundriya.m na  parijaanittha, no ca ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessanti.  a.t.tha puggalaa cakkhundriya~nca na parijaanittha  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaavessanti.
text.5549: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessati  so cakkhundriya.m na parijaanitthaati?
text.555: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa na nirujjhanti tassa  akusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhantiiti?
text.5550: [03] arahaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessati, no ca  cakkhundriya.m na parijaanittha. a.t.tha puggalaa  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaavessanti cakkhundriya~nca na  parijaanittha.
text.5551: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m na parijaanittha so a~n~nindriya.m na  bhaavessatiiti?
text.5552: [03] satta puggalaa cakkhundriya.m na parijaanittha, no ca a~n~nindriya.m  na bhaavessanti. dve puggalaa cakkhundriya~nca na parijaanittha  a~n~nindriya~nca na bhaavessanti.
text.5553: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m ^a^T2.0553^ea^ na bhaavessati so cakkhundriya.m  na parijaanitthaati?
text.5554: [03] arahaa a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavessati, no ca cakkhundriya.m na  parijaanittha. dve puggalaa a~n~nindriya~nca na bhaavessanti  cakkhundriya~nca na parijaanittha.
text.5555: [03] (ka) yo cakkhundriya.m na parijaanittha so a~n~naataavindriya.m na  sacchikarissatiiti?
text.5556: [03] a.t.tha puggalaa cakkhundriya.m na parijaanittha, no ca  a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissanti. ye puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti te cakkhundriya~nca na parijaanittha a~n~naataavindriya~nca  na sacchikarissanti.
text.5557: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissati so  cakkhundriya.m na parijaanitthaati?
text.5558: [03] arahaa a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissati, no ca  cakkhundriya.m na ^a^V3.0484^ea^ parijaanittha. ye puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti  te a~n~naataavindriya~nca na sacchikarissanti cakkhundriya~nca na  parijaanittha. (cakkhundriyamuulaka.m)
text.5559: [03] 480^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ^a^M3.0329^ea^ domanassindriya.m nappajahittha so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessatiiti?
text.556: [03] aruupe akusalaana.m bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m abyaakataa dhammaa na  nirujjhanti, no ca tesa.m akusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti. sabbesa.m  upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne aruupe kusalaana.m bha"ngakkha.ne  tesa.m abyaakataa ca dhammaa na nirujjhanti akusalaa ca dhammaa na  nirujjhanti.
text.5560: [03] ye puthujjanaa magga.m pa.tilabhissanti te domanassindriya.m  nappajahittha, no ca ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessanti. cha  puggalaa domanassindriya~nca nappajahittha ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca  na bhaavessanti.
text.5561: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessati  so domanassindriya.m nappajahitthaati?
text.5562: [03] tayo puggalaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavessanti, no  ca domanassindriya.m nappajahittha. cha puggalaa  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca ^a^T2.0554^ea^ na bhaavessanti domanassindriya~nca  nappajahittha.
text.5563: [03] (ka) yo domanassindriya.m nappajahittha so a~n~nindriya.m na  bhaavessatiiti?
text.5564: [03] cha puggalaa domanassindriya.m nappajahittha, no ca  a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavessanti. ye puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti te domanassindriya~nca  nappajahittha a~n~nindriya~nca na bhaavessanti.
text.5565: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavessati so  domanassindriya.m nappajahitthaati?
text.5566: [03] dve puggalaa a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavessanti, no ca domanassindriya.m  nappajahittha. ye puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti te   a~n~nindriya~nca na bhaavessanti  domanassindriya~nca nappajahittha.
text.5567: [03] (ka) yo domanassindriya.m nappajjahittha so a~n~naataavindriya.m  na sacchikarissatiiti?
text.5568: [03] cha puggalaa domanassindriya.m nappajahittha, no ca  a~n~naataavindriya.m na ^a^V3.0485^ea^ sacchikarissanti. ye puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti te domanassindriya~nca nappajahittha  a~n~naataavindriya~nca na sacchikarissanti.
text.5569: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissati so  domanassindriya.m nappajahitthaati?
text.5570: [03] arahaa a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissati, no ca  domanassindriya.m nappajahittha. ye puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti  te a~n~naataavindriya~nca na sacchikarissanti domanassindriya~nca  nappajahittha. (domanassindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5571: [03] 481^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavittha so  a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavessatiiti?
text.5572: [03] dve puggalaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na ^a^T2.0555^ea^ bhaavittha, no ca  a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavessanti. ye puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti  te ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaavittha a~n~nindriya~nca na  bhaavessanti.
text.5573: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavessati so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavitthaati?
text.5574: [03] dve puggalaa a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavessanti, no ca  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavittha. ye puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti te a~n~nindriya~nca na bhaavessanti  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaavittha.
text.5575: [03] (ka) yo ^a^M3.0330^ea^ ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavittha so  a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissatiiti?
text.5576: [03] dve puggalaa ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavittha, no ca  a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissanti. ye puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti te ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaavittha  a~n~naataavindriya~nca na sacchikarissanti.
text.5577: [03] (kha) yo ^a^V3.0486^ea^ vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissati so  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavitthaati?
text.5578: [03] arahaa a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissati, no ca  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na bhaavittha. ye puthujjanaa magga.m na  pa.tilabhissanti te a~n~naataavindriya~nca na sacchikarissanti  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya~nca na bhaavittha.  (ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriyamuulaka.m)
text.5579: [03] 482^b^.^eb^ (ka) yo a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavittha so  a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissatiiti?
text.558: [03] 107^b^.^eb^ (ka) yattha ^a^M3.0033^ea^ kusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti tattha  akusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhantiiti? aamantaa.
text.5580: [03] a.t.tha puggalaa a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavittha, no ca a~n~naataavindriya.m  na sacchikarissanti. ye puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti ^a^T2.0556^ea^ te  a~n~nindriya~nca na bhaavittha a~n~naataavindriya~nca na sacchikarissanti.
text.5581: [03] (kha) yo vaa pana a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissati so  a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavitthaati?
text.5582: [03] arahaa a~n~naataavindriya.m na sacchikarissati, no ca  a~n~nindriya.m na bhaavittha. ye puthujjanaa magga.m na pa.tilabhissanti te  a~n~naataavindriya~nca na sacchikarissanti a~n~nindriya~nca na bhaavittha.  (a~n~nindriyamuulaka.m).
text.559: [03] (kha) yattha vaa pana akusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti tattha  kusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhantiiti? aamantaa.
text.560: [03] (ka) yattha kusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti tattha abyaakataa  dhammaa na nirujjhantiiti? nirujjhanti.
text.561: [03] (kha) yattha vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa na nirujjhanti tattha  kusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhantiiti? natthi.
text.562: [03] 108^b^.^eb^ (ka) yattha akusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti tattha  abyaakataa dhammaa na nirujjhantiiti? nirujjhanti.
text.563: [03] (kha) yattha vaa pana abyaakataa dhammaa na nirujjhanti tattha  akusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhantiiti? natthi.
text.565: [03] 109^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^V3.0048^ea^ yattha kusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti tassa  tattha akusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhantiiti?
text.566: [03] akusalaana.m bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha kusalaa dhammaa na  nirujjhanti, no ca tesa.m tattha akusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti.  sabbesa.m cittassa uppaadakkha.ne kusalavippayuttaakusalavippayuttacittassa ^a^T2.0079^ea^  bha"ngakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha kusalaa ca dhammaa na nirujjhanti  akusalaa ca dhammaa na nirujjhanti.
text.567: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha akusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti  tassa tattha kusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhantiiti?
text.568: [03] kusalaana.m bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha akusalaa dhammaa na  nirujjhanti, no ca tesa.m tattha kusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti.  sabbesa.m cittassa uppaadakkha.ne akusalavippayuttakusalavippayuttacittassa  bha"ngakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha akusalaa ca dhammaa na  nirujjhanti kusalaa ca dhammaa na nirujjhanti.
text.569: [03] (ka) yassa yattha kusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti tassa tattha  abyaakataa dhammaa na nirujjhantiiti?
text.570: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte kusalavippayuttacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m  tattha kusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti, no ca tesa.m tattha abyaakataa  dhammaa na nirujjhanti. sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa  uppaadakkha.ne aruupe akusalaana.m bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha kusalaa ca  dhammaa na nirujjhanti abyaakataa ca dhammaa na nirujjhanti.
text.571: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha ^a^M3.0034^ea^ abyaakataa dhammaa na nirujjhanti  tassa tattha kusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhantiiti?
text.572: [03] aruupe kusalaana.m bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha abyaakataa dhammaa na  nirujjhanti, no ca tesa.m tattha kusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti.  sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne aruupe akusalaana.m  bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m ^a^V3.0049^ea^ tattha abyaakataa ca dhammaa na nirujjhanti kusalaa ca  dhammaa na nirujjhanti.
text.573: [03] 110^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa ^a^T2.0080^ea^ yattha akusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti  tassa tattha abyaakataa dhammaa na nirujjhantiiti?
text.574: [03] sabbesa.m cavantaana.m pavatte akusalavippayuttacittassa bha"ngakkha.ne  tesa.m tattha akusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti, no ca tesa.m tattha  abyaakataa dhammaa na nirujjhanti. sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte  cittassa uppaadakkha.ne aruupe kusalaana.m bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha akusalaa  ca dhammaa na nirujjhanti abyaakataa ca dhammaa na nirujjhanti.

text.576: [03] aruupe akusalaana.m bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha abyaakataa dhammaa na  nirujjhanti, no ca tesa.m tattha akusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhanti.  sabbesa.m upapajjantaana.m pavatte cittassa uppaadakkha.ne aruupe kusalaana.m  bha"ngakkha.ne tesa.m tattha abyaakataa ca dhammaa na nirujjhanti akusalaa  ca dhammaa na nirujjhanti.

text.992: [03] (ka) yassa yattha kusalaa dhammaa uppajjanti tassa tattha  abyaakataa dhammaa nirujjhitthaati? aamantaa.
text.993: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha abyaakataa dhammaa nirujjhittha  tassa tattha kusalaa dhammaa uppajjantiiti?
text.994: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne kusalavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne ^a^T2.0121^ea^ asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha abyaakataa dhammaa nirujjhittha,  no ca tesa.m tattha kusalaa dhammaa uppajjanti. kusalaana.m uppaadakkha.ne  tesa.m tattha abyaakataa ca dhammaa nirujjhittha kusalaa ca dhammaa  uppajjanti.
text.995: [03] 203^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa yattha akusalaa dhammaa uppajjanti tassa  tattha abyaakataa dhammaa nirujjhitthaati? aamantaa.
text.996: [03] (kha) yassa vaa pana yattha abyaakataa dhammaa nirujjhittha  tassa tattha akusalaa dhammaa uppajjantiiti?
text.997: [03] sabbesa.m cittassa bha"ngakkha.ne akusalavippayuttacittassa  uppaadakkha.ne asa~n~nasattaana.m tesa.m tattha abyaakataa dhammaa nirujjhittha,  no ca tesa.m tattha akusalaa dhammaa uppajjanti. akusalaana.m  uppaadakkha.ne tesa.m tattha abyaakataa ca dhammaa nirujjhittha akusalaa ca  dhammaa uppajjanti.
text.999: [03] 204^b^.^eb^ (ka) yassa kusalaa dhammaa na uppajjanti tassa  akusalaa dhammaa na nirujjhitthaati? nirujjhittha.
